name: Anabel Sanchez
text:
Went there this morning at 7am and they were closed.  Asked an employee outside what time they would open and he said 7:30am.  I had the same experience last time I went there maybe one or 2 weeks ago on a Saturday.

The ice cream machine is always down.  A few nights ago I took my kid to get a shake and the cashier said it was being cleaned.  I left and came back 30-40 minutes later and was told the ice cream machine was down.  That happens A Lot.  What I'm guessing is that they clean it and do not want to get it dirty again so they do not have to clean it again when they close.  It is always being cleaned or down.

Dirty.  Look around the fountain drink machines and it is nasty.

This McDonald's used to be top notch and the service was great.  But for a long time now it has been so bad that I try my best to go elsewhere if I have time.

name: Michael Handley
text: When you're hungry and that's the only place it's a good place to eat

name: Doug Roberts
text: Quick service, price was good and a good Big Mac!

name: Vasiliy Shkrum
text: Wrong order, doesn't ask me if I need sugar or creams in my coffee

name: Saadiyah Smith
text: The servers don’t wear gloves . This was not a good trip I just get coffee I don’t eat there but go be on this season and not have on gloves or a mask thumbs down I didn’t eve. Want to photograph them. YUCKIE

name: Reddd Herring
text: Ordered a large fry, water, and nuggets and I can say these fries were worst I have ever had from any mc Donald's. They were cold, stale, and had NO salt what so ever, and we were the only people in line! Their nuggets are the only reason they got two stars instead of one.

name: John Bandy
text: McDonald's was lovely. They quickly took my order of cheeseburger and soft drink and got me my food. Clean, good service, and not overly crowded. I would recommend it.

name: Bry Sandlin
text: Went to this McDonald's at 12:00am. The Google hours have it listed as closing at 1:00am, and yet the store was closed. I wish the Google hours would be updated if they closed early, because if not it makes the employees look lazy. We have had this issue MANY times before and just wish this McDonald's would uphold it's listed hours.

name: John McDonald
text: Food wasn't fresh at all. No salt on the fries. No ice in the tea and no Dr. Pepper

name: Cedric Hatcher
text: Rushed me. Didn't get my order. I felt like they didn't want to help me

name: Jayne Wilson
text: I love my McDonalds! Best service offered.

name: Kel Har
text: Food was fast

name: Chintan Patel
text:
Worst customer service. Never come here to waste your money. It takes 20 minutes to cook the order. I would have gone to restaurant for that amount of time.

McDonald's means quick food. And quick doesn't mean 20 mins.

name: Daniel Sheppard
text: Burger was cold and fries were so old they were hard

name: Jon Vickers
text: This location is aweful! The icecream/mcflurry machine is ALWAYS broke. On two separate occasions I have received RAW chicken nuggets. On more than a dozen occasions, they have closed at 12am and I'm in line at 11:30 or earlier and have had the window slammed in my face saying they closed. I WILL NEVER EAT OR VISIT ANOTHER MCDONALDS LOCATION AGAIN IN MY LIFE.

name: Carl Anderson
text: Same as most of the other Mickie D

name: Charles McDaniel
text:
Drive-thru was awful.
Did not take off our coupon.
And then got the eye-roll when we ask for salt and catsup.

name: Raven Hensley
text: I know McDonalds isn’t known for having great service, but this location it is the worst. It is consistently slower than other locations. Today I stop on my way home from work and when I arrived to the drive thru there was someone ordering in the first drive thru so I went to the second and the employee working the drive thru asked me to hold which was fine because I was still thinking about what I wanted. Then a few minutes went by and another car pulled up to the first speaker and was able to order right away. I felt so disrespected that I decided to go somewhere else, which I recommend doing, just go somewhere else.

name: Jeanette Davis
text: They were nice, efficient and kind. I did of course have to ask for more than 2 honey mustard sauces for a 20 piece nugget. They did give me 1 more. Lol.

name: Nicolette Medeiros
text: Awful. I don’t know if it’s the lack of people or the machines were broken but orders were getting confused and not 100% filled in store and the drive through. I spent a total of 45 minutes at this location and I still didn’t have my order completely filled. We started at the drive-thru, the lady taking our order which she did fine with. Then we proceeded to wait in line for 20 minutes. We paid, then pulled up to the receive window and it took a hot second for them to give us our food, but we got it. I looked in the bag and saw a portion of our order was missing, so we turned around and I went in store. The main cashier was super nice, I was very happy with that, and of no fault of hers, the orders we failing to come out properly and in a timely manner. There were a couple gentlemen in front of me when I initially went in store, they also failed to receive their full order as well. The cashier up front requested another order of chicken nuggets (what I was missing) and she told me it was going to be about 3-5 minutes. So I continued to wait. And wait. And wait. Then another 15 minutes went by all while people who came in well after I did ordered 3 separate orders of what I had been waiting for. So. I left. Terrible back service. The lady up front was sweet and for the most part accommodating, she came after me when I left and pleaded to help, but I just wanted to go home and I’m still 4 hours from home.

name: Lauren Evans
text: This is THE WORST McDonald's! The service is horrible my order is rarely the correct one and the food isnt edible!!

name: Cynthia R
text: The fish was dry and old and the double cheese burger was cold and dry. No napkins and will not patronize that McDonald again

name: Mary Angrisano Ladner
text: They are usually fast and the staff is friendly. I went through the drive thru and my order was right, food was hot.. I have no complaints:)

name: Paul Erickson
text: No service and totally failed.   Ordered through mobile app for curbside pickup.  After 30 minutes no order, restaurant would not answer phone and Lobby was locked.  Out the total for the order and 30 minutes of time.  Stay away from McDonald’s.

name: Daniel Talley
text: Fast and good

name: MeMe Acoff
text: My baby enjoyed his food

name: Stephanie R. Tinney
text:
~~THEY AREN’T ALLOWED TO MAKE FRAPPES RIGHT NOW~~
Pluck you Acton road

name: Tina Langnes
text: Waited 21 minutes in line for kids meals. Fries were cold, buns were stale and hard. They didn't give of apple slices with the meal even though it is on the receipt. Customer service was fair to poor. Tried to will out survey but it's website doesn't work either would higly recommend going down the street further to another McDonald's. Have to wonder what their health score is? Very unhappy customer ☹️

name: Tim Segrest
text: Ordered a big Mac got two pieces of meat on some bread then they tried to agrue that was a big mac. Then had an attitude when i wouldn't take it.

name: rufus lewis
text: Poor customer service in the mornings

name: P E
text: Burger tasted fresh and service was great and there was a sense of urgency ! Every time I  stop by this location there is always plenty of employees which is rare these days ! I know how hard it is, being a general manager to keep the restaurant staffed ! Usually a revolving door so it was a pleasant surprise n gotta say Im a little jealous of their being fully staffed every single time I have been here! But from a customer perspective it probably looks better than to have 3 people running around getting stressed and the food taking longer to make! Definitely well ran store from outside looking in! 👍

name: Madison O'Malley
text: Forgot half our order, didn't give us any sause for our nuggets when we asked for some the extremely rude woman argued with us about weather we had any. They also gave us the wrong burger and took it back through the window, then we watched them put the burger into someone else's bag. They had no signs say that the inside was closed and NONE of them had any face masks and the woman working the window didn't have gloves.

name: Michael “l3lindrage” Burris
text: Don’t waste your time at this store. Keep going to the next.corporate should take over this location. Bad for the brand.

name: Dallas Cooper
text: Had to put in my own order and they gave me some old dry grilled chicken that I couldn't eat, took it back to the cashier and they fixed me another grilled chicken sandwich and it's was dry like the first one so I threw it in the trash, I had to go somewhere else to get my lunch....never go there if you are looking for good and fast food.

name: Paul Lowe
text:
This McDonald’s doesn’t even deserve 2 stars. I’m just trying to give them the benefit of the doubt because it’s the weekend after Thanksgiving. Management should’ve been better prepared for this weekend given its location right off of the busy I-459.
On a trip from Tennessee, my family and I stopped at this McDonald’s. I waited in line for more than 10 minutes inside the restaurant. After standing at the register for a few minutes I was then told they were out of biscuits, McGriddles, oatmeal, and two or three other popular items.
The ladies in my family complained about the ladies bathroom.
This McDonalds needs to step it up!!
Good thing I don’t care for the food. Now, this will make me think twice about visiting any McDonald’s. Where’s the B. King at?

name: Sara Castillo
text: Would not hurt them to be curtious to greet costumers if they are busy with other orders...

name: Robin Lewis
text: Just ordered a Big Mac and it is soo small. I do not order this sandwich very often. It was pretty tall and tasty but I can usually only eat one half. Service was decent but not much personality in serving.

name: Judy Glanzer
text: Ordered/payed for Diet Coke, machines were out of dc, was told by one employee there was diet Dr Pepper, told them I did not want dp, the ONLY person that was helpful was Sandra, she helped check on Diet Coke and eventually gave me a refund.  No one else was helpful or concerned about customer standing there.  I go to this McDonald’s every time I am in B’ham, maybe will rethink my options!!

name: Rayford Smith
text: Ok I guess

name: Holly ballish
text: Friendly staff. Fast service.

name: Sucile Bibbs
text: Great  service  and food

name: Ashley Jones
text: This McDonald's is a great location. They are very quick as far as getting your food and they are always efficient as well as friendly

name: sheri reed
text: I go to its McDonald's more than I should because it is ABSOLUTELY  the worst one I've ever been to. One time I ordered 2 big mac there, my friend  and I were in a hurry. They put one patty on each sandwich.  They need different  people  that are more friendly  and efficient

name: Casee McKay
text: Ice cream machine always down and didn't have pink lemonade slushie as advertised

name: Richard Wilson II
text: Cold food

name: Reid Pickens
text:
The lighting from the street is poor at night. The employees were bad and were too busy talking with each other to actually fill the order quickly, the chicken sandwich I ordered was very small and tasted horrible (because the chicken and bun was cold). And worst of all, it took over 15 minutes just to get our food after ordering (not to mention how long it takes to order using the new screens McDonald's has put in [which have been shown to spread diseases]). I like McDonald's generally, but this experience has been my worst. I look forward to them getting better employees and implementing a better ordering system (as well as improving on the food I used to love growing up), until then I would recommend going to Burger King or Chick-fil-A.

P. S. For some reason it smelled like like someone threw up close to the counter (although, I've been to this McDonald's before and it's never smelled like that before, so, it might have just been one time thing.)

name: Mollie Pickard
text: Management needs to manage staff better. Waited at the register to order for a good bit while 3 to 4 employees chatted about changing shifts and playing on there phone. Order finally was placed for just a fry and Apple pie. With the same amount of people hanging around they still focused on everything else except the customer.

name: Robyn Worth
text: They got the order wrong waited 30 min in parking space 1

name: Trey Horton
text: took 20 min with 3 cars in the drive through..   geez... the McDonald family is rolling around in their graves..

name: Olivia Hernandez
text: This place was awful we bought $25 worth of food n all the fries were cold and just got thrown away never again

name: Eric
text: Chicken and Fries only..... LOL this is the second time they have not had hamburgers.  The manager told customers they only had nuggets and fries.  Very poor management.  It also took 27 minutes to get our food.... Because I asked for the food.  :)

name: Jeremy Piersol
text: Better than most McDonald's

name: Julie Jones
text:
Skip going to this McDonald's.

My vehicle didn't fit through the drive-thru so I had to go into the store. I was required to order from the kiosk and pay at the register.

Once they had my money hostage, I waited 20 minutes. I asked them to check on my order, and the response was "It's on the screen." Whatever that means. The clerk and the manager were both looking at me and neither went to check.  I finally am joined with my food 10 minutes after that. I was the only customer inside.

The sandwiches were luke-warm. I waited a total of 30 minutes after I placed my order.

name: p e
text: Great burger n shake! Customer service was awesome! Employees smiled n wished me a great day! Refreshing!

name: Rose bud
text: This is one off of 280 in Mt Brook Birmingham area and it was super slow for inside takeout i was in there for 25 minutes waiting. Nice employees. Busy time of day.

name: Dexter Hunter
text: Do not try going inside for breakfast.  If you cant use the kiosk or unable to find what you want, there is no one at the counter to help and I was told I had to use the kiosk.  So I left.  3rd time this has happened.  Ended up at another establishment that believes is helping the customer.

name: Steve L
text: This store is terrible.   For 4 weeks in a row I have come by here either Saturday or Sunday night around 8:00 p.m. ordering some ice cream.  I  Every time I am told the ice cream machine isn't working.   Is there even an ice cream machine at this location?

name: leland fritz
text: I have a truck with a small trailer and during covid-19 and we can't fit our truck in the driver and district supervisor Shanette assisted us with our order

name: Trent Daniels
text: Quick service. Quick in & out access from the interstate. Inside is updated. Restrooms were clean.

name: Chance Petty
text: Always friendly at this location. Stop here every time we have to go to Mountain Brooke.

name: Heath Kilgore
text: Food was horrible

name: vanessa jones
text: Bought 20 piece chicken nuggets at McDonald's for $5.00.  They were piping hot and good. I had to get some of the best french fries in town. They were fresh out of the oil. They were so good. The McDonald app has some very good deals and coupons. You can order and pay through the app. We eat at this restaurant at least three times per week. It is my children's favorite restaurant. They have a play area for small kids.

name: Courtney Marshall
text: Why is this place still open. Waited 20 minutes for a cheeseburger meal.

name: Eric Stanfield
text:
Can I give zero stars?  Placed my order then put my card in to pay when suddenly the credit card machine goes down.  They snatch the food back and tell me the CC system will take about ten minutes to come back up.  I ask if I could have my food and pay before I leave, after I eat and I was refused. Since I ordered a specially made sandwhich they said if you don't have cash we can't serve you and threw the food in some type of dispensor and told me "have a nice day"

I think the server actually got a kick out of this.

name: Patrice Carlisle
text: Fast and the food was good and Hot!

name: Hunter Gambill
text: Normally don’t go out of my way to write a negative review but when it takes 20+ minutes for a few burgers you gotta let the people know. Just doesn’t seem like enough employees are here, otherwise I don’t know why the line was wrapped around the building for so long.

name: Robert Matthews
text: Terrible service. No straws In the lobby. Had to have the customer beside me to get on the workers to come even to the feont counter and thwn lazily slowly approached the drink bar and turned the straw dispenser completely arofund. The ice cream machinenwas out atv5 in the evening. We were also told that we were supposed to use the  kiosk to order our food and drink so that customers weren't able to say the employees messed up our order or we couldnt say the employees did it wrong. She said if wenuae thatbmachine and there is a mistake then it's our own mistake.

name: Danny Gissendanner
text: The service e was very good, with little wait time.  However, both the burger and the fries were room temperature.   I did not have time to complain and wait for new food.

name: William Cowan
text: Worst McDonalds I've ever been to. Terrible terrible service, coffee was poured out of a moldy carafe and was cold. Absolutely disgusting

name: Kimeth Jeffries
text: We love McDonald's!

name: Benndfbxvcvx Xbox x xndndmxjsjxdnddbfvfda
text: Very very busy place during lunch rush hour..But,it's McDonald's.- worth the wait..

name: Charles Pilot
text: I understand that we are and a pandemic however this McDonald's is one of the worst McDonald's I ever been to when it comes to customer service

name: Wardell
text: Despite there only being one person working, the manager on duty made sure everything was wonderful. I commend her hard work. She cooked, ran the service window, and also attended to the front desk as well.  That's someone I would offer a job to any day. #hardwork

name: Derrick Lovett
text: Very fast service in the morning with friendly polite team member with smile working the window. The food was good as expected.

name: Darlene Willis
text: Biscuits were tough, hasbrowns was full of greese !

name: Michael Garrett
text: Typical McDonald's. Store was clean and staff seemed friendly. Food was ready quickly. Again, a typical McDonald's, maybe cleaner and friendlier than some.

name: J T
text: No surprise that there are several bad reviews here. Went by for breakfast on a Saturday morning at 8am and they had the lobby doors locked. The girl behind the counter just pointed at the drive-thru. We went elsewhere. I normally only eat McDonald's in a pinch which this was. Now I know I can't even go here for that.

name: Lora Benson
text:
Slow service, gravy taste like sausage water.
In what some would call "better neighborhood" you'd think it would be better. Not today.

name: Caleb Cole
text: The Acton road location is absolutely terrible. I work very close to this particular location so I typically would get breakfast and dinner there very often on my way to jobs. Now , everyone around this area simply says to “steer clear of this location”, and “ if you want McDonald’s go somewhere else”.The service is terrible, they never have essential items, and usually takes forever. McDonald’s  would be ashamed if they new how the location handles food, timing, organization, and their customers.

name: Daniel Clark
text: Food is good employees are polite. Service needs work.

name: Josh Williams
text: other than the lady that  helped me order it was an Awful experience you have to order at a kiosk then it takes them forever to get your food to you and it is  cold by the time you receive it. Employees in the back yelling at each other . If you only have a 30 minute lunch definitely don't go here

name: Margaret Rogers
text: It's a good place to take the kiddos because they love it.

name: Harold Powell
text: Happy

name: John Burroughs
text: On the road early yesterday, they had good pancakes and cold milk, friendly service and clean restrooms. What more can I ask for?  I'll stop again.

name: Brian Garrett
text: Worst McDonald's ever. Always so rude.

name: Donna Barber
text: Drive through was so slow. Two lanes opened and the lane I was in didn't take our  order for at least 10 min. Then stayed in line for an unsweet tea with lots of ice. When I got it, it had only about 5 pieces of ice. Should have went inside and fixed it myself but in a hurry for sister with cancer radiation appt. And we had about 20 min to spare. Used all the extra time for a watered down tea that we needed only to take meds with. Poor service!

name: Ayla Steed
text: The physical place was so sketchy. It had spilled drinks everywhere, napkins all over the floor and the chairs were all over the place. Some of the covers to the booths were ripped or coming off. There was no one to take our order and one of the workers was shouting at someone through a phone call. Wheh our food was ready they were supposed to bring it to our table but we had to go and get it our selves.The food however was very good. The fries were warm and crispy.

name: Nichole Climaco
text: Workers are just plain rude. Should be grateful they have a job during this time.

name: Will Morton
text: They don't start serving lunch until 11:30. I've went by there twice in the last week at 11 and I've been told they weren't ready for lunch

name: Remy Helu
text: Getting much better

name: Darlene Willis
text: Tables were not wiped off, coke area needed cleaned.

name: Savannah Duran
text: 20 minutes for my food... ten more for the missing sauces. Cold by the time I got my sauces. I said something to tee and jollen but no one seemed to care since I had already paid. Not good management at all. On a side note all managers should be well versed with their systems and jollen did not know how to ring in for a side of tomatoes. Regular employees may not know and I get that but that's not acceptable for a manager to not know

name: Chris Howard
text:
Manager proceeded to chew out a drive through cashier right in front of my wife and I over a previous customers change in their order while the young lady was trying to take our money....
Very very low class management.

name: 1122Mystique
text: Poor customer service on the weekend. Entire crew was so unprofessional!!!

name: Brian Waites
text:
Great service
Ordered ice cream cones and sundaes on the first real hot day of the year so far

Very clean and courteous service

name: Paul Miller
text: If you like McDonalds then you'll like this location

name: Ursula Cole
text: My family and I visited today and we weren't pleased at all.  Our burgers were raw and I asked for fresh fries,  they were not freshly cooked at all.  We live out of town and was passing through.  Drove too far to turn around for a refund.

name: Da doodad thingamabober 16251
text: Horrible..entire restaurant's floor was SLIPPERY from grease everywhere.  Rude employees went to the back when they saw us enter and wouldn't wait on us.  Dont bother...nasty hole.

name: Lauren Tucker
text: Fast service and my order is accurate every time!!

name: Anna Conley
text: Don’t stop here unless you have all the time in the world. I gave up after 15+ minutes and left without getting my food.

name: Kelly York
text: We stopped at this McDonald's on the way through Birmingham and my wife went to the bathroom and there was no toilet paper and when my wife asked for some they told her they don't put it in both stalls and they wouldn't put any in there.  So we decided to not even eat there.  How sorry is that.  To beat it they laughed at my wife when she said she'd use napkins because they wouldn't give her toilet paper.  What kind of McDonald's is this?

name: Jennifer B
text: I wasn't bothered while using wifi- even when closing for shift change.

name: Kathleen
text: It always takes them way too long, drive through line always takes forever. And they get orders wrong

name: Judy Elliott
text: Fast and convenient, good was tasty

name: Ryan Harrison
text: Food is consistent and classic. The dining room was a mess and there were not that many people in there. That's the only negative thing I saw. The staff was very friendly and attentive and the food was prepared quickly and was hot.

name: Trey Pickard
text: Service has really become unpredictable at this location over the last 6 months. Opens at 5 most days, but have found the doors locked at 6. Runs out of cash and will only accept credit/debit  cards way too often. What you order and what you receive may not be the same. May be better to keep riding and find the next one...

name: G Hfield (Birmingham Bitcoin)
text:
By far one of the worst Mcdonalds around town. They will turn off the drive through on you if it’s 20 mins til closing. Also, they have some rude employees no matter how nice and kind you are. I’d suggest stay away. I can say the District Manager
Sent me a few coupons which was nice. Hence, the 2 stars. But over all not even worth the headache.

name: Sgt. Mullins
text: Stopped to use the bathroom.  McDonald's usually has clean and functional restrooms.  Not this one, obviously had not been cleaned for several shifts and the mens room toilet had no TOILET PAPER. Managerial collapse. Never go to this McDonald's.

name: Alicia Faye
text:
THIS PLACE IS HORRIBLE....
They MAKE you order from the kiosk and even if you done in you still have to get up and get your own food.
The lady who was "taking orders" was so rude to the senior center citizens who disdid understand how to use the kiosk.

name: Dixie Eubanks
text: Good quality food.  Fast service

name: tres b
text: Seems to be staff focused, poor customer service

name: Gina T
text: Service was slow but at least the lady in the first drive through window was nice. The lady in the second window grunted when I told her thank you when she gave me my drink. A "you're welcome" or "no problem" would have worked. They also forgot my fries butttt at least the lady in the first window was nice.... I will not be stopping there again.

name: Donald Cox
text: Waited 15 minutes inside to get a Double Quarter Pounder combo.  The meat was fresh alright.  The bottom bun was completely saturated with grease. When I picked it up it fell completely apart. And my fries were cold. I've been there twice and both times its awful food and service.

name: Jamie Pate
text:
This place is absolutely horrible the only thing that I can say is the poor old lady running the front desk she can keep her cool this lady needs to be defusing bombs for the Army
I would leave 0 stars but the website won't let me

name: Robert Poole
text: I just left the drive up. Asked for a fresh fish filet with lite sauce. Ofcourse it was not fresh with heavy sauce.

name: Rhonda Triplett
text: The experience was fine. The food was tasty. They were doing some maintenance on different equipment (which is totally understandable) so things were a bit "messy" behind the counter. Other than that, everything was fine.

name: Charlotte Mims
text: Never Again!!! Rude and they just stand there and look at you from the drive through window after never even answering the speaker. My bad did not mean to bother y’all ...we thought it was a business! Ha!! and somebody please clean that window !

name: Christopher Gallagher
text:
Our visit was disappointed and had less than desired results. We tried to order at the counter and was instructed we had to order at the kiosk. The receipt only printed blank with no one to help with an order number within 4 minutes.

While we were there an elderly man was told he had to order at the kiosk. When he said he did not know how and that he wanted to order at the counter, the employee told him, again, to order at the kiosk.

He had to request a manager, who seemed annoyed, to take the man's order.

The restaurant was dirty. Chairs were missing and dirty.

Disappointing experience.

name: Shahidah Armstrong
text: The staff was not friendly. They weren't rude but I've definitely experienced warmer welcomes than this location. My fries were hot , but the BigMac buns could have been fresher and more sauce. Management should make sure soft drink area is clean and the floors are dry.

name: jonathan guerrero
text: Great service! Every time I go to this location, I can help but to smile. These people are working hard. I always get my food a little faster than before. I wish more locations would do the same

name: Keith Browder
text: I assume a Chick Fil-A manager's skin must crawl if they ever have to eat here after seeing the way this place is run. I come here quite a bit but only because the location is convenient for me.  Food is fine, once you finally get it.

name: Erica Hansen
text: The kiosk was easy to use, but the employee has to do their part as well.  The order was wrong, but she was eager to fix it.  The caramel iced coffee is always sweet except at this store....asked for extra syrup and whip cream.  Initially it came without any of either.  I was on lunch break and didn't have time to chase a correct order....moderately frustrating.

name: Adam H
text: We stopped here on our way home. Good food fast service, easy access to interstate.  It's on an exit with not a lot of traffic or other stops, made entering and exiting interstate easy!

name: Ginger Tunnell
text: Always the best coffee. And good service.

name: Tina Mullenix
text: I was very disappointed my muffin was burnt black and it looked like they were very short handed for morning shift. Awful experience. No smiles or good greetings either.

name: Jennifer Fitzpatrick
text: It's McDonald's so not much to say. The bathrooms were clean. The service was a little slow. Some of the employees weren't friendly or eager to help. The store, however, is clean and there is plenty of seating. There are 2 drive-thru lanes, and acceptable amounts of parking to eat in. It can be very busy in the mornings, so if you're looking for something quick, this is not the place to go

name: Alan Stephens Falletta
text: It was delicious! In Gina famous words open quote I didn't have nothing but an Egg McMuffin close quote and so it was a very affordable fast delicious breakfast

name: Renee Rivera
text: Horrible place!!! Please train your associates. Yelling will not make someone understand English when it is not their primary language. Also, train your kitchen staff to actually put the sandwich together in a way that looks as if you care. My dog could do a better job!!!!

name: Samuel Tingle
text: Poor customer service, and they gave me my eggs and sausage in a box for chicken strips.

name: Angela McGinnis
text: I ask for diet coke and Dr pepper and ask again when she handed me my drinks ate u sure this is diet coke.Get home it taste like flat rootbeer

name: Matt Speer
text: Stood at register for 10 minutes while being ignored by the staff. When someone finally came over they rudely asked if I was familiar with the kiosk. I would have used the kiosk but had a buy one, get one sausage biscuit that couldn’t be used at the register. Then wanted a order a couple of mochas and was told the machine was broke. I hope management / owners look at these reviews and fix things.

name: brenda Kinsey Reeves

But NO while I’m ordering I see three works just standing around doing nothing. The kiosk are there for if a customer wants to not wait in line and go ahead and order not so the works can get a free pay check. After this occurred I brushed it off my shoulder and after I received my food a Customer walks in that probably speaks little to no English and is told to use the kiosk and when he doesn’t understand the request the worker disrespectfully loud mouths back to him saying the kiosk is right there and points her finger. She then returns to doing nothing but talking to her coworkers. This is not acceptable!

text: I don't normally comment negatively on much.  Yesterday was a different story.  First,  myself (and about seven other cars) sat in the drive thru for at least 15 minutes.  Once I got to the intercom, I ordered pretty easy items.  2 regular hamburgers, a McChicken sandwich and a large fry.  They got my order right.  That wasn't the problem.  I live five minutes from this location. Granted, I got home and changed out of my work uniform, but that may have taken another 5-7 minutes.  When I finally sat down to eat my food, the buns were so hard on my hamburgers that I could've used them as coasters for my drink.  Every single french fry was hard as a rock.. probably because they were old and from a previous order that someone left out of frustration for the drive thru taking so long.  The only reason I even rated my experience with this particular location was that the chicken sandwich was pretty good.  I won't be back

text: Sat in drive thru for 25 minutes. Got to window and was told my card wouldn’t read on the scanner. Not that it didn’t have the money, but that it just wouldn’t read. So I asked if they couldn’t just manually input the information. “We don’t do that.” Was all she said as she handed me back my card. Not once did she ask if she could try a different scanner or anything. Terrible customer service.

name: Shane “Sandaddio” Gibbs
text: Excellent personnel. Loved the manager on duty and very clean.

name: Jesse Gwynn
text: I'm a semi frequent eater of McDonald's breakfast, and this was the worst I've seen. The drive thru lady couldn't hear for some reason and was quite rude and dismissive. The woman at the 2nd window was also rude about telling is to pull forward. And last but not least, the woman who brought the food out had a scowl on her face and didn't respond when we said thank you. And to top it all off, the order was wrong. Didn't bother asking for a manager because I didn't feel like being disrespected a 4th time.

name: Brad Stevens
text: Waited at counter for 10 minutes and nobody said anything to me.  Finally I ask if I can place my order, he said they don't take orders, I have to go to the kiosk to place it.  I spend 5 minutes trying to place my order, then when I swipe my card it spits a ticket telling me I have to pay at the counter.  I go to the counter with my ticket to pay and the guy tells me they only accept debt cards with chips, they don't take the ones you gave to swipe.  20 minutes in the store and I left with no food.

name: Jose Perez
text: Ordered two breakfast burritos with hot sauce, a steak egg and cheese bagel, combo 2 just the sandwich, a sweet tea, and mango frape. Went to the second window and the handed us a frape and we asked what is this? We asked for a mango and then manager was really rude. "This is a frape. We don't have a mango frape." And we asked could she exchange it with a mango smoothie and she has an attitude about that too! She rolled her eyes and turned around! Told us to pull forward and closed the window on us and we were trying to tell her a car was already pulled forward so we couldn't move. She opened the window and told us again to pull forward. How could we? Bagel was cold. I've never in my life written a bad review because I think most people lie but this manager at the McDonald's on Acton Rd was seriously rude and needs to be handled correctly. I hope she wasn't the manager because she shouldn't be in charge. Still want that $15/hr pay don't ya? Maybe you should have a better attitude.

name: Diana Coates
text: Once upon a time this was great McDonald's location. Actually my favorite. Food properly prepared, with friendly and quick service. Now days it is slow at best food is usually overcooked or cold and the staff acts like they really don't care. This morning I ran thru the drive thru, they handed me my food...hard cold biscuit, hard greasy hashbrown, right away, however they then prepared my coffee while I was watching, sat it down, and preceded to take several more orders while I was sitting there waiting...and by the way, when they finally handed it to me, the lid was not on so I spilled coffee on my pants and jacket before I even got to work....thanks McDonald's, way to make someone's day, and I have to say that unfortunately this is what I typically expect from this location and I don't stop there very often anymore.

name: Chynna Chambliss
text: Worst experience ever. My boyfriend ordered through the mobile app and when I got there the lady said they had not received an order. I had a screenshot of the order and showed her after she rudely said he must have put the order in at another location. She snatched my phone and called her manager and was discussing then asked for a screenshot of the payment status when it was on the first picture but anyways after showing the payment status, she slides my phone across the counter and does not say anything to me if she or isn't going to make it. The gas station clerk asked me if they were going to get me straight and I said well I hope so. Then the subway lady doesn't acknowledge me and says to the gas station lady, so the order was lost and she (me) is going to have get refunded so it's like she (me) is getting the sandwiches for free. I didn't care for a refund, after 15 minutes I just wanted my food. When she finished making the sandwiches, she put them in the bag and slid the bag across the counter and I was trying to be nice because maybe she had a bad day or her manager wasn't so nice on the phone and said hope that wasn't an hassle. She walks off and says it happens. I did not appreciate the service she gave. Next time, I'll go to jersey mike's.

Why is it that young people nowadays just don’t care about anything that they do?! Management is young and don’t care and they train their employees not to care either! text: So we frequent this Subway and was very displeased with the conditions inside. name: Allan Schwindling
text: I made the mistake of stopping at the new Bojangles in Montgomery yesterday. First of all getting in and out of the parking lot is a nightmare. Turning left from Ann street is almost impossible. But that's not my major concern. During my wait in the drive thru I witnessed workers hanging out in the back corner of the parking lot. No big deal. Until one of the girls change a diaper on an infant and throws the used diaper over the fence. My point is, what does this say for a new restaurant. Having employees standing around and not even caring about this incident. Thanks but no thanks. Won't be spending my hard earned money there again.

name: Matthew Voke
text: Good food.

name: Mitch B
text: Typical Bojangles food and environment, but my experience was marred by poor service. On a Sunday lunch, the store was poorly staffed, the staff that was present seemed to be untrained by the poor service I received, and the food quality was lacking. If you are a Montgomery local, unless things change, visit the Eastchase location.

resp.text: Mitch, would mind sending us additional information on your visit to social@bojlangles.com?

name: AA Beauty
text: I give bojangles 5 stars. The chicken is always hot and fresh. Great spot to stop to eat while traveling.

name: Steven Penny
text: Apparently they were originally giving out incorrect size cups for the first few weeks so I was expecting a larger size when I placed an order tonight. Instead of just saying sorry for the confusion, offering me the medium cup or asking if I'd like to pay the difference, the male manager that took my order just acted like it was my problem. I was annoyed but I drove away and wanted to eat the Mac and cheese but they didn't give me any utensils(I was working) so I had to dig around my car and luckily I saved some plastic ones from another restaurant. I then tried to eat and there was a hair in my food. I went back received a refund and was told sorry by the cashier and possibly another manager that was around but the male manager that had to process the refund didn't have anything to say.....hair in the food and you couldn't say sorry for the inconvenience? Not anything major, just disgusting hair where it shouldn't belong and not very cheery attitude from the manager. I can get the same service from KFC if I wanted...which I don't and they've been around for years.

name: Chelsea Dodge
text: The girl that is working the register this evening was the most rude and ugly person. I ordered a drink with my salad and was giving attitude about it then no dressing no forks and she acted like it was above her to do her job. I won't be eating there for a while.

name: Shaun James
text:
I visited bojangles at about 8:40 pm on 1/7/2018 .
My experience with this reastaurant establishment was not a good one.I went through the drive through and waited about 10 mins before i received my food.I didn’t find out my order was incorrect until i got home.I had to ask for napkins and a fork.When i asked for hot sauce for my chicken they told me they was out .Who sales chicken without hot sauce? The 2 guys who worked the window was very rude..They act like i was bothering them for asking for things that was suppose to come with your meal.

resp.text: Shaun, we're very sorry to hear this. Can you please email the details to marketing@landonholdingsinc.com?

text: Fantastic business with great and fast service. I personally like my sandwiches toasted which they do a great job at especially with the type of bread they offer compared to other locations. As a local business owner, they are locally owned as well. 5 stars all around!

name: Kyle Kyser
text: Fantastic sandwiches! You can't go wrong with the wicked. My only complaint is that sometimes my sandwich is sometimes cold in the center.

name: Davon Fox
text: Great customer service and friendly staff!! They are helpful and go over the menu well. The egg on the sandwich was so runny it came entirely off, but other than that, great experience! Seriously, if you're looking for a good sandwich, this is one of the best. Just make sure to tell them your preferences for everything, the sandwich is up to you!

name: Gared Crabtree
text: Great Sandwiches and Service~ Thanks

name: Kay Ohtie
text: Always delicious! Change things up and try something new every time you go, it's very much worth it! And check out on the Hooked app for coupons! They often have a coupon for free chips and a drink with any sandwich!

name: Caitlyn
text: Never ask them to put salt on your sandwich... They way overdo it. Other than that, the sandwiches are good. Pretty average. They have the fancy ice cubes. Sometimes they have free stuff on the Hooked app.

name: Ji-Sung Ko
text: everything is perfect - - customer service on point, order came promptly, and the sandwiches were amazing. great price for a great sandwich. daniel who made my sandwiches did a wonderful job, and the cashier was very friendly and showed me how everything worked. will definitely come again!

name: Evan Baker
text: Good sandwiches with infinite customizations, but the prices are higher than expected for a sandwich.  Vegitarian options are also available.

name: James Fogal
text: Amazing food at an attractive price. I was impressed with their sandwich.

name: Jeff Smith
text: Yum.  Grinder with fries.

name: S S
text: We have been here twice since it’s opened because we love which wich. The last time we stopped in for a quick bite was before I had class, and they messed up my order (which doesn’t make sense because everything was clearly marked). It wasn’t just one thing but three that were added and they put so many olives on it, which I didn’t ask for, when every other ingredient they only put a few. I didn’t have time to get a new one which was disappointing as I now have a bad taste for the restaurant. The space is also incredibly small.

name: Andrew Lipscomb
text: Great food and very friendly staff. Relatively high price, but the sandwiches and shakes are so good it's easily worth it

name: Jack Shanahan
text: How is pickup orders temporarily unavailable during a pandemic?

resp.text: They were turned off by mistake.  Sorry about that.

name: Yeney Garcia
text: the sandwich quality was very good and fresh. i loved everything i got and will be back for sure😋

name: Toast McGoats
text: Best sandwiches! Their ordering system is unique but the staff is very helpful with ordering. The Bánh Mì, Wicked, and Ultimate BLT are my favorites.

name: Zachary Mutty
text: Quality Sandwhiches, Quality Service, Quality Enviornment. #Teamwhichwich

name: Sydney Rigsby
text: Quick service and great sandwiches

name: Tori Dillard

text: Cheeseburger which is my go to

name: Jonathan Brooks
text: Best sub in Auburn

name: Zack Denius
text: I liked it

name: Xanthey Belmont
text: Service was good, food was not. It was like Dollar Tree Subway. It would have been fine as a subway knockoff but the prices didn't reflect that at all. Tea was very old, sandwiches were bland.

resp.text:
We want our guests to feel that the quality of the food they receive matches the price they paid, and it is disappointing to hear that you do not feel that way. We will ensure your comments are passed along for the private owner and our marketing department to review. We are tremendously grateful for your feedback, Xanthey, and hope you give us another chance to make you a fan!

Anna / Guest Services

name: Marla Brewer
text: A wonderful addition to the selection of places to eat in our town. Firehouse Subs offers hot and fresh sandwiches as well as salads, soups and mac and cheese. Fresh made tea is a real pleasure, although no senior drink discount was a disappointment. The staff is very friendly and efficient. Our food came in a very reasonable amount of time, they do need to work on identifying different sandwiches in large orders. Overall I was impressed with my first visit to a Firehouse and will return. Be sure to sign up for the rewards program.

resp.text:
Marla, thank you for the awesome feedback! We can't wait to see you on future visits, your loyalty is greatly appreciated.
Hannah/ Guest Services

name: Kenya Baldwin
text: Firehouse Subs coming to Andalusia soon! The one star review below is not accurate! At this location there is and will soon be open a firehouse sub! I will come back once open and leave a new review for them below!

name: William Cassa
text: Left wallet with money in it on Monday on the way to the beach.   They had it there on Friday on the way home.   Will make it a regular stop.   Great food too!

resp.text:
Wow, that's some high praise, William! We hope to see you soon!

Trista/Guest Services

name: Fred Flintstone
text: The managers and most of the staff are very friendly and happy. This energy rubs off on us every time we visit. The food could be mediocre and we’d still come for the friendly atmosphere. The fact that the food is awesome makes it a five star experience!

resp.text:
Fred, thank you for sharing your experience! It's great to hear the staff was able to deliver heartfelt subs and service. We hope you visit again sometime soon.

Anna / Guest Services

name: Albert Robertson
text: The food is good and I like the way they greet everyone when they come in.

resp.text:
Great food and heartfelt service are what we believe our guests deserve and what we strive for each day! We hope you visit again soon, Albert.

Anna / Guest Services

name: Dana Smith
text: My husband and I decided to try it out since we normally love Firehouse! I realize they’re new and not all locations will do what other locations do. I ordered an Italian, normally they’ll allow me to get turkey instead of ham, but not here. I also asked for no tomatoes, no onions, and no mustard... all three were on my sandwich. I’m not sure what the point of asking how I’d like my sandwich if you’re not going to do it right. Normally I would take it back and have them remake it but I didn’t this time bc we just wanted to eat and head on to my in-laws house. Hopefully it’s just because their new and this isn’t the norm. We will probably give them another shot.

resp.text:
We appreciate your patronage and your feedback. Hearing that your order was not made correctly is very upsetting, Dana. We strive to provide quality food, made accurately, for each and everyone one of our guests. We are very sorry and will ensure your comments are passed along for the private owner to review and address internally. Thanks again, Dana, for providing us with this invaluable feedback!
Sabrina/Guest Services

name: EVA Ellis
text: Great food, staff is a little slow, and They forgot my pickles, but food was delicious.

resp.text:
Eva, thank you for taking the time to share your concerns with us. Please know that we take them seriously and your comments have been passed along for the proper leadership to review. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope you have a great day!
Hannah/ Guest Services

text: New, clean, great service and crew, no doubt!

name: Bri Herrick
text: How can you mess up a double cheeseburger and iced caramel coffee? You visit this location. One bright spot was the order/cash taker at the first window. Pleasant, smiled, too good for McDonalds. Only reason to visit again would be to see if the first time was just a fluke.

name: Anthony Dixon
text: Not impressed with the new chicken sandwich at all. Seems like the same old chicken sandwich they had before.

name: Victoria Brown
text: It's honestly hard to find a consistently good McDonald's though this location always give you, not only what you expect of fast food restaurant, but the foundation of a fast food restaurant. They are always,  fresh, and hot. I know most of us look forward to the long lost fries at the bottom of the bag, but they package everything so neatly that this fry stragglers are a thing of the past.

name: Jacob Chad
text: If your open 24/7 that should mean as such. Showing up and the lanes blocked off by those sexy cones was the highlight of my evening/morning...UPDATE YOUR HOURS ON GOOGLE so people dont waste time driving there!!!!!!

name: Raptor Jesus
text: I second the opinion I've seen a few times here on this review board, but with a catch. It's not just this location that does well; they do, but one employee in particular stands out. Saheed, the only employee working there at 10:30 PM on a Saturday night, was blazing through a line that wrapped around the building. Our order was perfect, fresh and ready at the window. Dealing with both drive-through and walk-in customers, this guy has got it HARD. Just a shining example of someone who deserves to do better in this society but is kept down by corporate greed and the stagnant minimum wage, notwithstanding exceptional effort and efficiency. I'll be coming back only because I know they can handle this.

name: Amber Terry
text: I visited this McDonald's today. I bought my baby a chicken nugget happy meal. My other kid a big mac. I had a caramel frappuccino and look what I saw... I'm very irate. That's why I always check my food and never eat in the dark. Be cautious. Be are.

name: Lilli _ann
text: On March 29 at 10:55  after waiting for 10 minutes at least my partner and I get to the speaker only to have them tell us they're closed. That's not what the time listed says. I'd leave 0 stars if I could. Based on other reviews the place has gone downhill. In general do not recommend this place at all

name: Randy aka xXClusterOneXx
text: This is usually our "go to" McDonald's. The food is always fresh and the service is fairly fast. All my orders have been correct. Not sure about the ice cream machine though.😉

name: Tanya Franklin
text: Ordered a large fry. Service was good but my fries were cold like they had been sitting. It was not busy and shortly before the lunch rush.

name: Arena Hill
text: i don’t understand why people still waste their money on mcdonalds, it’s disgusting not healthy at all and very rude employees all the time. especially this location one of the african american manager, lady got an attitude with me when i said the cinnamon roll is always hard & cold. and she said well we just microwave it that’s all! that’s why it’s hard & cold you have to eat it fast, and i was like sheesh in my mind this lady could of said nothing instead!!

name: Ardy Gee
text: During the day it's wonderful I give it five stars until about 8pm after 8 it seems like the milkshake machines always broken. everything's a lot slower. the people are a lot less friendly.  Don't get me wrong there not rude by any means just not quite as friendly. and the milkshake machine always being broken really ticks me off because I love my milkshakes...

name: Merrily Serota
text: Always happy with the service. Food is ready quickly even when special ordered! Great prices on meal deals!

name: Michael Norris
text:
Absolutely terrible. Before going to the hotel, we visited a little before 11pm on a Friday night. Sat in the drive through line forever. We decided to do a mobile order. Placed the order and marked it as inside pick up. Little did we know the doors were locked so we could not get in.

I wasn’t going to wait another 30 minutes in the drive through line only to move up one car spot. I tried calling several times to tell them to cancel the order. No answer. I’ve left voicemails after the “beep” which sounds like I should record a VM, but no phone calls back.

After reading some of the other reviews, looks like this place just 100% sucks.

name: Diquinda Mccrary
text: Delicious food. My meal was neatly prepared and served hot. This is my second time in one week ordering at this location . My drive thru order was prompt and I received friendly service from the drive thru server.

name: jeffery green
text: Shut this one down. Go thru the drive thru at midnight wait 10 minutes to order then pull around wait another 5 minutes for the food you ordered and pray you got the right food. The attitude of the employees are pathetic for fast food workers.

name: Beverly Crider
text: Out of sanitizer at both payment kiosks. After entering order at kiosk, I was notified the payment option was down and I would have to pay at counter. That should have been stated up front.

name: Cedric Mason
text: The quality of food ,correctness of orders ,and attitudes of workers has really went down again at this location

name: Harold Threatt
text: Always good service,I send my employees there all the time to get breakfast

name: Son of Hecate
text: A nice short wait when you order your food off the kiosk.

name: David Burrowes
text:
I usually go here for their hot fudge sundaes, but after this experience, I may need to rethink that. I pulled up at the drive through, and there were 2 cars in each lane.

After a few minutes of the line not moving, I decided to park and go inside. The manager was having a conversation with two customers about some mixup in their order. It took a few minutes to get that straightened out.

There was another customer ahead of me, and neither of us were ever acknowledged or spoken to. I decided to get back into the drive through. There were two cars in each lane again, and I got into the outside lane.

Well, the person managing the drive through sent two cars through for each one car in my lane.

Then, when I got to the first window, I had a tough time understanding the young man about how much I owed. I  proceeded to the second window, and I  got the sundaes, and I had asked for extra fudge sauce. It's usually put in on the top and the bottom. One sundae had it only on top, so I questioned the woman about that, and she said that it was extra, just on top.

It wasn't bad, but the service just seemed slow and inefficient. I'll give them the benefit of the doubt, as I believe they were understaffed.

name: Sharon Tucker
text: Though the drive through lines were long, the service was fast.

name: Edward Pettway
text: We were given the wrong order. The waitress, that brought the order, had just got through smoking, and the food smelled like smoke. Her attitude, was horrible. After thinking about it, I went in to cancel the order. I found the waitress, putting her hands all over the food. It took them twenty-three minutes, to give me a refund. I will definitely not visit,this McDonald's restaurant, ever again. I used to love going to McDonald's.

name: Ocie Curry
text: Love my big mac meal with a caramel frappe

name: Alan “AJ” Bredemann
text:
I can only review this place from the standpoint of an employee, since I were to pretend to be a customer my account would biased. Also note that this is my first retail job, so that probably affects my perception quite a bit.

In brief, it's a nice place to work; they pay well for entry level, provide flexible hours and good management. It's good work if you wish to pick up a job

On the downside, training is a bit sporadic as you are taught more the longer you work there, at the beginning it's easy to feel almost helpless in many situations. It's also very easy to get overwhelmed during rush hours, but usually things work out.

Overall, I dont think I could have asked for a better first job. I will certainly come back whenever I'm back in town.

name: The Blue Gaming Troll
text: It's McDonald's, but this one has fast and friendly service through the Drive thru.

name: Mike Christopher (1-WHO-1)
text: I’ve lived in the area for many years and have by far had more missing or incomplete orders than I have correct orders. Every time I get burned I swear to never visit again, but then months or years go by and I stupidly return only to get screwed again. I can’t even fill out a survey to complain because the receipt is so faded...

name: Rayvon Murray
text: It was very very busy but girl at the counter was very nice and fast!

name: Aqiea Cole
text: At some point I felt the costumer service was getting better. But lately it’s been kind of bad. There’s not really a problem during the day. It’s mostly at night. It gets really slow and the employees aren’t as nice. Hopefully this will change.

name: Juicycat Solo
text: My 2 year old nephew loves their apples and fries! So we have to go here.

name: Sebaross Harashi
text: Good and fast. Even the tea is great

name: Step East
text: The drive-thru service was great, server was very friendly and the line moved quickly. My food was okay but could have been better (fries were old, cold and hard and my fish sandwich and bun were rock hard around the edges and the middle of my sandwich felt soft). I ate all my fries but didn't make it passed the hard edges of my sandwich. If it weren't for the excellent service I received in DriveThru, I would've easily given this McDonald's 2 stars.

name: Hailey
text: Food was good but people were not friendly.

name: John Arnold
text: Never been there but Google wants me to review it. They are always busy so I'm sure it's great.

name: Maria Valenzuela
text: I came to get a couple of meals today and I asked for 4 sauces. Yes, I asked for 2 sauces as soon as I ordered, but last minute I asked for 4 before I came around and paid. She was rushing to take my order so obviously she didn’t hear that. When I paid and got my food, I asked nicely if my 4 sauces were in the bag. I’m very understanding if it’s forgotten since I’ve worked fast food before. She said there was only 2 in the bag and proceeded to charge me for 2 more. I was okay with paying. I got home only to find 2 sauces in the bag. So why would I get lied to and charged for 4? I should’ve checked myself. I’ll take my time and check the bag next time since I know I’ll probably be lied to. Giving 3 stars because I never have any problems here, and usually the cashiers double check for me and are nice about it. The cashier who handed me the food worked the shift May 6th around 5:00/5:30pm.

name: Dawncember Willis
text: The employees at this location didn't have their on properly, down around their chin. Restaurant Employees and anyone else dealing with food and beverages, NEEDS to cover their nose and mouth Period.

name: Nadine Bradley
text: Worse service ever. Got in line for the drive through at 1015 pm after a football game. There were 10 cars in front of us. By the time we got to the display to order it was 1059. No one would take our order. By now there are about 7 cars behind us. They come on the speaker and tell us the store is closed since it’s 1105. They should have come out and closed the drive thru. Very hungry and upset kids. Could have gone to another if we had known That they would not Serve us.

name: Justin Welkenback
text: Current wait time at 5 am(when I pulled in line with 2 people infront of me) 20 minutes and I didn't even get to place my order I'll be with you in a minute they said four times. only one person at the window apparently they don't know how to take an order.

name: Purrito 38
text: I love this place and their ice crram machine actually works thank you for wjta you've done

name: Skylar T.
text: A bit of a wait, but good service and cheap food.

name: Khadijah Kendricks
text: The manager made up for this not so pleasant visit. It's not fair that the person doesn't listen to ALL of your order and when u correct them of THEIR mistake at the window, they want you to drive around to reorder because they have a line. No sir! I will not.

name: Laura Whitfield
text:
Trip 1:
Sat in drive thru for Doordash order 23 minutes. This was after sitting in the online order/curbside pick up spot and trying to call them to let them know where I was (bc i didn't have time to sit in the line). They took the phone off the hook. Total wait for order 26 minutes.

Trip 2:
I'm a slow learner apparently. I don't know why I acceped another Doordash order for this location, but I thought I'd give them another chance. Again I've been here 18 min and havent made it to the intercom.
UPDATE: 30 min waiting on this order and they inform me that they're out of cookies. Completely out. This order had 2 cookie totes (26 cookies). These cookies are break and bake and literally take minutes to bake but they couldn't be bothered with it at any point during my 30 minute wait. Total wait 33 min.

The bags have stickers on them so you cant check to make sure the order is right. I'd put $100 on the food being wrong in some way.

It honestly seemed like the employees were trying to make it a horrible experience. Maybe they thought we would go away? Probably goes without saying, but definitely no apology/thank you/attempt at being friendly in the least.

How much you think I made off these orders tonight? $6 before gas and taxes...not to mention whatever other orders that came up that I missed out on. Makes me want to Karen.

name: Addie Moss
text: I am not the type to leave bad reviews on places but this is consistently the worst mcdonalds location. Its absolutely awful and they make customers wait for 30 mins in the drive thru only to say cash only, which has been happening almost every night. They wont accept mobile orders either.  I am a regular to this McDonalds because i have no choice; it is the only 24/7 restaurant in the vicinity and it is constantly short staffed with extremely lazy and rude people. Please do something about this mcdonalds. There should be no reason why the system is working perfectly fine during the day but somehow malfunctions every night. Every time I come here it makes my mood significantly worse because something ALWAYS goes wrong and it is yalls fault. I wont stop leaving bad reviews until something is done because I cant put up with this service any more.

name: Jim Tessin
text: Had an app deal which was large French Vanilla iced coffee for .99 cents and was it ever good. Staff was great too!!!!

name: Josiah Whitlock
text: Unlike others, I think McDonald's cheeseburgers are good. McDonald's fries are also always great.

name: Matt Zylstra
text: This place doesn't deserve 1 star. Apparently this place thinks plain cheeseburgers come with ketchup mustard and onions. This is the 3 or 4th time I have asked at the window if it was meat and cheese only to be assured it was. Get home and I have to find him something else to eat. I despise this place. The only worse McDonalds location is in Bessemer. But at least they get the order right some of the time.

text: This is by far one of it not THE WORST McDonald’s I’ve been to. I work and mange in the food service industry and I tell my customers all the time, “me and my girl work a lot and we eat fast food most nights, and I always expect to go TWICE”. This McDonald’s is THE PRIME EXAMPLE OF WHAT I MEANT. The food is as inconsistent as I’ve ever seen, the management is none existent, they close various hours during the night, you’d be better off going elsewhere, I’m mean ANYWHERE ELSE than here !!!!!!!

Acoustics poor: all sounds bouncing around most especially beeping, phones, blenders, etc. making it a torture chamber to the brain.

McDonald's food: edible? Coffee: ok.

Power workers out there: I found only one outlet..

text: I’ve given this location many chances but never felt any differently. The inside is never really clean which I understand it’s fast food but I mean just wipe off some tables once in a while. Also I’ve never once spoke to a nice or friendly employee.

name: Nneka Hartfield
text: Poor customer service. Did not receive how much my meal was until I got to the window. There was no line so I am not sure why I was rushed to the window. With this, the rep never smiled, never said good morning, and just continued to hand me my food with minimal interaction. There are better food options with better customer service. I’ll be choosing them next time.

name: Stuart King
text: Atrocious. Staff can't be bothered to make fresh food or clean dining area. The Big Mac I ordered had obviously been sitting out for hours - the bread was dry, cracked, and hard as a hockey puck and the cheese was discolored from being exposed to the air for too long. I already don't expect much from McDonald's, but this was a travesty. Get some bare minimum standards and stop cutting corners by serving old food or you're going to make someone seriously ill. Then you'd have something worse to deal with than a bad review on Google.

name: Andrena Longmire
text: Great service! Even when I didn't hear my number she brought our food to us. And the food was nice and hot.

name: ART95129
text: This is the NASTIEST McDonald's I have ever seen in my life! Stopped for breakfast @ 0830. The women's restrm had no tissue paper, menstrual smeared all over the toilet seat and spills dried all over the the floor in the dining area. I notified the manager immediately and waited for 10 min. She never sent anyone to clean up any of it let alone do it herself as a good manager would. There was a guy sweeping the outdoor play place and that area seemed to be the only good thing about this location.

name: Ginger Minor

name: Rapheal King

name: Nicole White
text: This experience was HORRIBLE I do not know why this location is still open while trying to remodel. There is construction everywhere which seems like a hazard for customers and employees. I visited tried to go through drive thru it was a nightmare!! No one on the construction crew even tried to direct you around all the foolery.

name: basanth K

name: Bosmane Robinson

name: Brian O'Donnell
text: I can't understand places sometimes. So we are here from out of town looking for a quick bite. I pull up to the drive thru to order breakfast. I go thru my entire order, Sausage mcmuffin no egg, 4 burritos, 3 hash browns and sausage egg and cheese mcgriddle. Side note, not all for me. The person on the other end says we are out of sausage. No big deal. The issue is she didn't get any of my order. She heard me say sausage and stopped listening to my order,  so I had to repeat the things that didn't have Sausage patties. They had sausage for the burritos. She also didn't ask if I wanted any salsa or ketchup. So we I got to the window, I had to ask. The person getting my food seemed annoyed that I asked. The ultimate thing that drives me nuts, is they never put napkins in the bag at the drive thru. People this should be the last thing you do. Customer Service is dead. This is a business that feels you need them instead of thinking they need us.

text: I went through the drive through and picked up two cheeseburgers. When I get on the interstate open the first one Define had no meat in it. Then I checked the second burger and it had no meat either. I was Zero for a thousand. I was already on the big road and didn't have time to get off the next exit come back. What a sad way to start an evening.

This was the best McDonald's we have visited in along time. It was clean like a new one. The best service and friendly people to take care if you. The food was hot and good.  Highly recommend this one. It was located in the Hoover, AL area, across the hwy from the Galleria.
I wish the one in Sylacauga, AL was as clean. Being clean and hot food means alot to us.

Despite all doors saying 24 hr dining, and their sign saying 24hr dining. They had all the doors locked at 11:40 p.m. and we checked multiple times 24. HOUR. DINING.
Yet, a group of people were eating happily as we attempted to open all of the locked doors. (because we checked every single door) The employees happily ignored us. Real classy.

text: Good service on most days and pretty quick, but not the cleanest place. If you just need a quick bite and don't need the best atmosphere, then I would recommend here. But if you're looking for a slightly friendly, cleaner, and all-around nicer feel, I would recommend looking elsewhere.

Renovations are nice except now they just forget at least 1 thing on your order every single time.

Last week I order 4 cheeseburgers and got 4 mcchickens. Had to go back. Today they just didnt even give me half my order. Really impressive stuff from this McDonald's. Drive 2 more miles down the road there's a better one.

text: It's mcdonalds

text: The so call staff is too busy talking to coworkers to fully take your order, not to mention we didn't know if she was speaking to me or or friend next to her, doing absolutely nothing. Then she "forgot" to give us the kids meal that was ordered and then got mad and huffed and puffed because we asked for it. The place was extremely nasty, bathroom was horrible and besides not having any tea out and 8:00 pm, the drink trey had all kinds of trash in it and of course the ketchup dispenser was out with the lil cups strowed everywhere. The food was ok but I would never go back. The pictures I've added just really doesn't show how nasty everything was.

name: KIMBERly Richardson
text: Terrible ...thank me later

name: Amanda Fox
text: They just apparently closed the store, at 11 pm, with a line of cars in the drive thru and didn't say a word to anyone. Didn't bother telling any of the line of customers waiting that they were closed. You can't make this stuff up.

name: Ski On1
text:
I really just don't understand why the owners of this site expended the effort and the costs to completely renovate this McDonald's, yet apparently are not in the least bit concerned over how poorly it's overnight sales have got to be reflecting lower sales than before the facelift.  If the owners would just take 10 minutes to read their most recent Google reviews, they could make the desperately needed changes that the night crew currently are so terribly in need of immediately.  I assume, however, their apparent lack of concern all around with how poorly run this site has been doing business must mean that they're not concerned about their profits. And that's really sad because that translates to customers that upper management doesn't care about us and our concerns.

There are 2 things I know to be 100% CONSISTENT and TRUE about this McDonald's:

1. That for any given hours between midnight and 4:00AM you'll be turned away by the staff because their "system is down again".  More than likely, it'll be told to you  over the drive thru speaker in a short/abrubt/rude manner and/or tone.

2.  That, should you win the lottery during those late night night hours and actually make it past the drive thru speaker's gatekeeper, and give them your order...when you arrive at the window to pay & receive your anticipated meal, there is a 75% chance the staff will say anything to you, beyond the amount you're due to pay them, (because they're so deeply preoccupied in their own interpersonal conversations behind the coumter), and there is a 100% chance that you will NEVER be sent off with a "THANK YOU!!".  Never. And that includes the day shift employees,  in addition to the overnight crew.

name: silvia troncoso
text: K like always

name: alan goble
text: Horrible service. Ordered a large coffee and was given one with the wrong lid. Coffee spilling out of the drink. No napkins were offered. And the employee shut the window and walked away before i could even ask for some napkins. I normally enjoy this McDonalds but service after 7pm drastically goes down hill.

This location is a hit or miss. More of a miss then hit. It's rather normal to have an item missing.  Some employees are very kind and polite. Others present a frown and do not know how to conduct friendly customer service salutations.  Saying thank you and come again should be done with a smile. Getting a thank you was a struggle.
Management should ask for help from Chick-fil-A.

When I went into get it correct led the shift manager I assumed did not apologize or say anything to me. They corrected the order but still nothing was said to me. This just horrible customer service. No matter how new the building of the service is the same why bother. DO NOT GO!!!  Wendy’s have better service🤷🏽‍♀️

With the new renovations, they should have gotten new employees as well. Would not recommend, and that's sad that I have to put that while also KNOWING that you're not going to get good service at a mcdonalds anyways.

text: Horrible service and when I went into the drive through I experienced nothing but rude attitude and snippy comments when all I asked was to change my drink because I changed my mind about what I would like to drink. I would understand frustration if I was at the window but I never left the menu with the speaker and they were being extremely rude with a horrible attitude. So I left. I came back and went inside to try and see if I could get better service inside and to no success they are just as rude and short inside as the window and they messed my order up completely and refused to change it claiming I ordered it like that. I will never come back to this store and will never recommend this place to anyone. The owner or manager needs to take care of this imedianlty. This is no way to treat customers.

text: Customer service is lacking. Some of the morning staff are unfriendly and act as if they are inconvenienced by serving customers. We frequently use drive thru before work. Numerous times we have not been able to get waited on and had to leave without ordering.  This morning was another one of those times. Management should really address this.

text: A great McDonald's!  We have a special needs nephew who won't eat much else except a McDonald's hamburger made a special way and this restaurant accommodates our request consistently.  It gets busy and they work hard to get orders completed quickly.

text: Best McDonald's Ive ever been to. It was clean and the fries were fresh. Staff was very professional and friendly. Which is unusual for McDonald's😄

text: Fast service, nice drive-thru services. Sometimes, there are items not available, but overall its good. It is also kept clean at most times. I have been served by some very nice and some extremely rude and discourteous people at this location, so I guess it's a chance. Sometimes, the icecream and mccafe drinks were literally filled just a little more than half of the cup. Please give out correct portion sizes.

name: S T
text: Used the mobile order for curbside pickup, and waited in the parking lot for someone to bring out the food..  after sitting there for 15 minutes, we decided to go inside to see why our order was taking so long (which defeats the entire purpose of curbside pickup), and had to wait another TEN MINUTES before someone even spoke and asked what we needed, only to find out that our food had been sitting on the counter the entire time.. so we ended up spending almost 30 minutes waiting on an order that should've only taken 5 minutes.

name: Jason 4PhiT Calloway
text: Went through drive through with a fairly simple order, 2 for $5 fish combo (fries & coke) and lg caramel frappe. Didn't get a word other than welcome to McDonald's and the amount of order. I was very polite as I have worked for fast food and restaurant for 20 years. Once I get to window she would not look at me and went out of her way not to speak. Beyond rude. Honestly it seems like because Hoover PD killed an innocent black man all white customers suffer. I have talked with more than 5 customers who feel the same way

name: Sp3tsnaz - CODM
text: Great service, prefer this location over the one near Sprouts off of Hwy 150. Took awhile getting my order together, though

text: Very clean
