text: Excellent value.

name: Busy Bee
text: Would give 0 STARS if I could. Problems with card reader, no straws, no napkins and this wasn't during lunch rush. I placed my order and sat down to browse my phone while I waited. At one point I heard "Big Mac up" but because a number wasn't called I assumed it was for the drive through. When I worked at a McDonald's as a teen that's how the kitchen let us know food was in the bin. After a while the lady behind the counter rudely yelled "Ma'am your Big Mac has been sitting up here for a long time". When I walked up to get it I told her that I didn't know because I have been listening fir my number. She didn't even acknowledge me other than to roll her eyes and walk off. Glad I was only passing through. I will never stop here again when I visit Hoover.

name: TAMIKA Posey
text: Please do not visit this place after 9 p.m. you're gonna get horrible service and the younger crew running this establishment..

name: casey harrison
text: At drive thru now and no one seems to be wanting to work!! This is poor pitiful excuse for a McDonald's!! I am just wanting some breakfast and no one seems like they want to work tonight if you say your open 24 hrs then be open 24 hrs this is just ridiculous!!!!

name: Michael Streufert
text: Ordered and paid for a double cheeseburger.  They gave me a single.  As I approached the counter to have my order corrected, the young lady already started shaking her head and started to argue.  Once I showed her the receipt and markings on the box and tried to explain again, she rolled her eyes and got the burger corrected.  The grease was pouring from the burger and I had to use napkins to not ruin my clothes.  The fries were good.  I will not be going back.

name: Cheyenne Kozak
text: Bathroom had someone's dried period blood on the toilet and floor (I get people suck but it was dried). The kids place was littered with trash. Food was decent. Service was alright. Not great, but not bad.

name: Anthony VanSlambrouck
text: Well when I ordered my coffee with three creamers and an ice cream cone. I was handed my coffee first without any of the creamers in it and then my ice cream cone. Before I can ask for creamer in the cone the cashier had left to take care of another customer so trying to hold my ice cream cone in one hand and put creamer in the coffee cup with my other hand I noticed that the creamer that they had on the side was horribly horribly curdled. Nice staff but this place is kind of a mess

name: Hill Allen
text: Today I went through the drive-through at this location.  After the pre-recorded message giving me the "special" and saying place my order when I am ready, I placed my order.  No response came and a couple minutes later a voice came over the speaker asking me if I was ready to place my order.  I again placed my order.  When I was done a voice came over and said they couldn't hear me because I was too far from the microphone.  I then leaned out of my window as far as I could and as loudly as I could placed my order.  I was again told they couldn't hear me. I said I have placed my order three times. The woman came on and said I didn't have to have an attitude with her and that I needed to be louder. I started to place the order again, but got no response.  I yelled, "Can you hear me?"  No response.  "Hello?!"  No response. Then in a normal tone say I will just pull up and order at the window.  To that I get a response of "OK."   When I get to the window the cashier asks what I will have.  I start placing my order with her and a woman with a microphone comes around the corner and interrupts and tells me that it's not her fault she couldn't hear me.  At this point I tell her then must be something wrong with their equipment because a customer should not have to lean out of the window and scream their order and still not be heard.  She gave me a head bob and said there's no reason to be that way and walked away.  I then was able to place my order with the cashier.  I said to her that at some other fast food establishments the person taking the order gives you their name as you order to ensure better customer service.  She then replied in a snippy was. "Nope, we don't give you our names here."  I said "I would guess not, or it would make it to easy for customers to complain about poor service."   When I pulled forward the girl handing me our food was polite and all smiles.  I complimented her and told the manager behind her that it was nice to have a happy person at that window when the people taking the order were terribly rude. I don't know if the equipment was faulty or if the drive through person was just having a laugh at my expense watching me through the camera trying in vain to place my order.    Either way, the aggressive nature of the worker was completely uncalled for and unacceptable.

name: valerie mcdaniel
text:
If you want McDonald's before you go shopping at the Riverchase Galleria Mall this is the convenient option. There is no longer a McDonald's in the Galleria's food court. Please beware this McDonald's is under construction and only the drive-thru is open for business. I recommend that you be careful because the entrance is a little awkward especially during high traffic hours. It sits in a shopping center with other stores like Ollies, Pier 1 Imports, 5 Below, Play it Again Sports, Creative Nail Spa, ULTA Beauty, David's Bridal, and JoAnn's Fabric. I ordered McChicken combos and Cheeseburger combos for my nieces and nephews. The children said their food was delicious. I had a pineapple mango smoothie, it was very refreshing on a hot summer day. The customer service was very pleasant.

Update - The construction is finished so you don't have to worry about that anymore.

name: Michael Parsons
text: I love McDonald’s. But this experience was sub par. And or for McDonald’s, par is not too high to start with. For the third time in 6 months I have visited this location around midnight. I have been told the same story each time: “our system is down” and this time I was told: “ it will be 30 minutes until it is back up.” I don’t know what would possibly take 30 minutes to come back up, but that is the story. Long story short, I hope this review is read by the franchise owner. I am sure you wouldn’t like this kind to service. As i was at the window obtaining the store number, a member of staff asked me to leave because the window was unlocked and she feared that I would come in through the window. What kind of line of thinking was this young lady using? Bizarre

name: Madelyn P
text:
Do yourself a favor and avoid this place in the mornings, especially if you have anywhere to be. It consistently has one drive-thru employee and a line so long you can easily wait ten to fifteen minutes for your order.
However I kept giving it a chance, mainly because it’s on the way to work and I need coffee in the morning. Just a coffee. But they can’t even get that right. On several occasions now the girl has handed me a large cup of black coffee (which I don’t drink) and nodded when I asked if there was cream and sugar in it. I didn’t realize her error until much further down the road and I don’t have time in the morning to squabble about a $2.15 loss or the patience to sit another fifteen minutes in the drive-thru.
This morning I called back and spoke to a curt and frazzled “manager” on the phone (She said her name was Shameka) whose response to my complaints only left me more frustrated than I was before.
Don’t waste your time at this location. Drive further down 31 and go to the one across from Ellis piano. They are friendlier, faster, and much more efficient.

name: Tiffany Redfearn
text: I absolutely love this place. Took my niece and sister and they loved it too. The wait staff is nice and informative. All kinds of different pizza options with cool names. The vibe is good too. A great place to take some friends, order a couple different pizzas to share and some drinks then just have a good time. 11 out of 10, super highly recommend.

name: Elizabeth John
text: This place was so cool! We loved it :)

name: Jesse Schaffer
text:
Food was fine but the pickup experience was very bad. I've ordered from here a couple times over the last year or so and it's the same thing every time. The food is never ready when your confirmation email says it will be.

Today was the worst it's been, had to wait 25 minutes after the ready time given to me on the email. Pretty sure they just started making it when I walked in. Food is fine, just be prepared to wait if eating in and don't expect your food to be ready at the time given on confirmation.

name: Josh Forteza
text: Plenty of beer on tap and great pizza. Current happy hour is 4-6pm, $2 off all beers.

name: Tiffani Moore
text: The food quality was really good. Only reason I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because the kitchen was so far in the weeds on 3/5/21 that it took over an hour and a half to get our food. The place was packed to capacity. That wasn't their fault though so I still recommend Mellow Mushroom for pizzas, sandwiches and calzones.

name: Zoe Hinkle
text: This was my first time eating at this location of Mellow Mushroom. Delicious food and great service. I also liked the decor! This one is way better than the location on Old Shell.

name: S Rutledge
text: Service was extremely slow. I happened to look at the time when we ordered because I was waiting on a phone call.  It was exactly 1 hr and 5 minutes until our pizza arrived.  The crusty was WAY overcooked to the point the knife wouldn't cut through it(on the bottom) but we were starving and not gambling for another hour wait.

name: brian prickett
text: No sauce on pie, I asked for extra, $3.00 per topping, I got 7 little chunks of sausage, 8 jalapeno slices, and a few slivers of onion.  Too much cheese, and it was barely cooked.  They used to be way better pre covid

name: Amy Carnes
text: Whenever we get take-out and show up at the time they tell us to,  we have to wait an additional 30 minutes OR MORE! Twice they hadn't even started cooking the pizza when we got there (lost order?) Last night they were super slow AND running out of many ingredients. Our four topping pizza was a two topping. (Mushroom & jalapeño pizza wasn't so great!😞) And we didn't get the gluten free crust we ordered. The manager did say we would get a free med. next time we order, and I appreciate that.

name: Tim Smith
text: Don’t order delivery it’s a large up charge because they use door dash. So you pay way more to order three a system that doesn’t let you complain that you pizza was delivered cold and an hour late.

name: ty “cookie on 144hz” podpora
text: My favorite pizza everytime i visit i get mellow mushroom lizza

name: Olivia Haston-Carter
text: Food was good .. came out a lil colder than I expected but I would go again!

name: Carlos Mesia
text: Nice experience. Great food with great drinks. Families and couples enjoying great Service.

name: Joseph Fletcher
text: No wait te night we went. Ordered and huge salads came out. Pizza came out quicker then we'd seen in the past too. Price is a little high but quality is great.

name: Sharon Meagh
text: Waited over 90 minutes for pizza! Waitress was apologetic however could not tell us how long it would be. The manager went to the table next to us and comp some of their food. We were all waiting the same for our food. She should have at least comp the drinks for all the tables. Poor management . Their main concern was to go orders and not the seated customers

name: Glenn Davis
text: Food always decent.  Not near enough parking on a busy night

name: Tim Cunningham
text: Great service and food was great.  Fresh lettuce and tomato made my wrap great.

name: Joseph Hantouche
text: Great and kind service, slightly slow in the kitchen. Food was also good. Definitely the nicest Mellow Mushroom in the area from design to service!

name: Makayla W
text: Food always gets messed up but the servers and hosts are very nice and respectful.

name: Jill Hinkle
text: The food  would be better if they used less cheese. Felt like I was going to choke on it.

name: Bob Hopkins
text: First time for us. Daughter recommend. Super good pizza. Excellent staff. We will definitely be going back.

name: Woody Myers
text: Wonderful experience! First, asked for lemons in my tea, got the very first time I asked, so rare! Appetizer was great. Their beer cheese is amazing. Ordered a specialty pizza. I did not like it. They asked, not complaining, I ordered it. They changed my order and even up-sized it. That was icing there. I was already getting full from the first slice. New order comes, so good, so full. This is brick oven style pizza don't see that much. They have a little sports bar. Plenty of other options on the menu. Clean restrooms. Impressed, impressed, impressed!

name: Shane Kleinpeter
text: Visiting family and came here for dinner.  We ordered a meat lovers (can't remember the exact name) and a mushroom (Holy Shitake ) and a cheese pizza for the kids.  All the pizzas were fantastic and the crust was amazing.  Great beer selection especially on draft.  Service was friendly and fast.

resp.text: Great choice with the pizza selections Shane! We appreciate your input and can’t wait to have you again!

name: Bernadette Neece
text:
Slow in  getting food to table , coffee not good and didn't have  creamer. The four was good
Server was nice but not great.

name: Cindy Nguyen
text: Got there at 6:30 and was told there’d be an hour wait on our pizza. We left at 8:45 bc we never got our food. Seems like they prioritize Togo orders than the people actually dining in. Terrible service. I wouldn’t recommend to anyone unless you like to wait 2 hours and still not be served.

name: kathy kruize
text: Awesome pizza. Great service.

name: Rachael Ailshie
text:
This pizza was hands down the best I have had! Customer service was great as well!
I got the pepperoni pizza for my picky husband and he loved it and I got the Holy Shiitake Pie and I was seriously blown away! Way too good not to try!

name: Tabitha Harwood
text: Always fresh and hot. Service is great. Love the options of veggie and vegan.

name: Rimmy Bullock
text: Really good food, really good service. The waitress was sweet, but left us alone while we were eating and we really appreciated that. She only came over to fill up drinks. it was nice not to have a helicopter waitress. We will be eating there again for sure.

name: Pablo Matheu
text: The calzone were on point and delicious!

name: Coe Murdock
text: This place has the worst service in the state of Alabama. Took over 2 hours and no one seemed to care at at all. Hire more people it ain’t hard

name: Ryan Beverly
text: First off I'm glad to have a location just right around the corner from me. It sure beats having to go to the midtown location or going the Old Shell Location. Takes me less than 6 minutes to get to the new one. The decor and flow of the building is outstanding and I also understand that it just opened up so it IS gonna be packed and service will be slow as they try to  weed things out. Only been open maybe a week. We did wait for awhile for food but it was worth it. I'm sure the wait times will improve with the upcoming weeks. But yes parking was an issue having to park in the grassy dirt location next to the parking lot. Hopefully they can maybe purchase that lot and extend the parking lot. The food however was outstanding when we got it. Hot and tasty. Our server was attentive and everything was delivered properly​ and food came out perfectly. Bottom line just wait till the kinks are worked out about wait times and parking lot and I'm sure the ball will get rolling. I will be back for sure and probably be my new spot considering it's convenience.

resp.text: Ryan thanks for the awesome review! You are so understanding and patient and we APPRECIATE YOU! We are happy to be in your neighborhood and can't wait to have you again :) Stay Mellow!

name: Nicholas North
text: Calzones were excellent. And Sunday is all day happy hour.

name: Trey Holyfield
text: Fabulous pizza - I get the Holy Shiitake whenever I go, and its always good.

name: Sarah Price
text: Placed online order for an Italian hoagie. Bar tender said foood was ready, then proceeded to chat up two guys at the bar before bringing food out--15 minutes later. Brings the bag, says she needs to go get the chips. Comes back 10 minutes later, no chips in bag. Leave because sandwich is cold. Get home, my "Italian" consists of mayo, turkey, pepperoni, and ham... No cheese, no tomato, no basil, no spring mix, no onions, no salami, no dressing. How is it possible to both screw up an order so completely AND have terrible customer service.

resp.text:
Hi Sarah, I am so sorry you had that experience with us. We strive to get our orders out promptly and correctly. I have spoken with the team about the issue you had with us and we will correct it immediately. I found your order online and refunded you for the hoagie. I hope you give us another chance to make it right and please feel free to reach out to me at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com.
Thank you,
Alison- General Manager

name: Justin Kline
text: Ok place. This was my first time at this location but have to to others. Service was fine and food was average. Will probably not go back but a good place to grab a brew.

name: Ryan Davis
text: Pizza is great and the service is good. Also, the men’s room has a baby changing table! We had a great family dinner

resp.text: We appreciate all of the awesome feedback Ryan! We can’t wait to see you again!

name: Paxton LaJoie
text: Great food, very kind and attentive staff! Our server Kayla was wonderful.

name: Barbara O'Hara
text: Most delicious Pizza we ordered the House pizza it was wonderful especially the crust yum delicious we will be regular's😋

name: Stacey Dellinger Murrell
text: My favorite pizza there is the mighty meaty. The kitchen was really slow, but our server was great! She told us that the kitchen was short-staffed which is really to be expected during this pandemic. The pizza was well worth the wait, and since we were sitting outside the ambiance was fantastic!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars and being understanding about our wait times! We agree, the patio is one of the best parts at this location and we love all of our great servers!

name: Billy Odom
text: Slow,  people got their food before me,  had to ask for silverware

name: Taraneh Atigh
text: Best pizza and food in Mobile! Big and nice space.

name: Property Care & Maintenance
text: High price for cheap food. We were not impressed. May have been an off day for the cook and prep people, they did not seem busy.

name: H Reynolds
text:
Worst pizza we've had in a while.
Skimpy ingredients that were completely missing on some slices.
Top it off with a burnt, limpy crust  (made the mistake of ordering a thin crust that they obviously do not know how to make) and you get the worst pizza.
Won't be back, ever. Especially at those prices.

resp.text: Hey H Reynolds! We are so sorry to hear about your experience with us. It's not like Mellow Mushroom to serve pizzas like this, so we hope that you reached out to a manager during your visit with us. We would have very gladly made you a new pizza to yours AND our standards. We appreciate your feedback and will make sure that the kitchen staff is aware of this so that they can address consistency issues. Thanks!

name: Melissa Hicks
text: Love this place. Best long Island iced tea!

name: Mike Nettles
text: Nice atmosphere and friendly attentive staff!

name: Bobby Rosson
text: Good pizza Great service

name: M K
text:
The pizza was amazing, my wife was able to get a great Gluten Free pizza that she enjoyed. Our waitress was very nice and helpful.

The only down side was we where put at a very small table that made it difficult to eat my 10" pizza and my wife to eat her Gluten Free pizza without accidental contamination.  That being the only issue, we will be coming again.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Jeff! When it comes  to pizza we know you need your space! So glad to hear your experience with us was nice, and please don't be afraid to request a larger table during your next visit. We would love to accommodate all dietary needs and can see where a smaller table might be an issue. See ya soon and stay Mellow :)

name: Linda boudreaux
text: Nice restaurant it was clean and have good food

name: Kaitlyn21 R
text: Pizza, yeah, super good. Everyone at our table was quite pleased. I will be back with my friends.

name: Jeffrey Hunter
text: My wife and I,  had a spur of the moment DATE EVENING. Came for the Grateful Dead drinks and wings. Left with a pizza. Had the BEST WAITER EVER!! His name was Sean. Told him that we are BIG on customer service....made my wife and I feel as if we were the only ones in the place.......SALUTE!!

resp.text: Sean is one of our favorites as well! Thanks for the wonderful review, we can’t wait to have you again Jeffrey!

name: Jesse Neth
text: Placed an online order for pickup and was given a pickup time of 20 minutes. Got to the location in 20 minutes, and was told the order was just started. The explanation I was given was that online orders go through a third party and they can't accurately give pickup times. If that is true, I think it's time to find a new service for taking your online orders. Anyway, was told it would be 15 more minutes. After over 30 minutes, I finally got my food. The cheese bread looked like it was under a heat lamp the whole time my pizza was cooking. Pizza was ok, not great, just ok. Will not order from them again.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear about your poor experience with us Jesse. Unfortunately, we do have alot of issues with our online ordering system that we are continuously trying to resolve, however that does not excuse your pizza and cheese bread from being sub par. We would love to make make it up to you if you would have us. Please reach out to me, Alison- General Manager, at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com so that we can discuss this further. Thank you for the review and we hope to  redeem ourselves with you.

name: Lance “Gascan” Howard
text: Great pizza, cool vibes, and an expansive beer menu.

name: Mike McCants
text: I bought a salad to go and when I got back to work there was no utensils in the bag.  When I called about it they said we only give out utensils if you ask for them.  I told them they lost my business.  Then to make matters worse I opened up the salad and a small fly came crawling out from under the lettuce.   🤢

name: Lydia Overton
text: Great location for west Mobile. Plenty of room for large parties, also a beautiful partially covered patio for outdoor seating with the pup! We always enjoy my favorite pizza, the Cesar with the most amazing pretzel bites with beer cheese! If you haven’t been here, go!!

resp.text: We love our pups just as much as we love our customers! Thanks for this wonderfully nice review Lydia and we hope to see you soon!

name: Marcus Carroll
text: Okay service. Beer selection is kinda weak. This location feels watered down with much less charisma.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback Marcus! We are still fairly new (just over a year) but are really working towards that “family” feel amongst our employees. We thank you for your patience and hope that you’ll give us another try in the future!

name: Michael Davis
text: Good food good service

name: RUBY NIKE
text: Fast and courteous service. Definitely saw employees cleaning and disinfecting areas thoroughly. Food was made perfect and served hot!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars! We are making sure to provide a safe dining enviroment for all of our guests and staff. We hope to see you soon!

name: Robert Escalon
text: Always a great experience. I recommend the holy shitake pie with the addition of artichoke hearts. The artichoke blends well with the sauce and onions on the pizza.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars Robert! The Holy Shiitake is one of our favorites too!

name: Andrew Carstarphen
text: Food was very good.

name: Judith Dunning
text: My wings were cold!

name: John Belo
text: It was GREAT good food &Service we loved it

name: Gmaxx 76
text: Good food, good selection and good service. Place was clean.

name: TC Gurus
text:
This location is by far the best in Mobile. We stopped going to the University location for several reasons and decided to give this location a try. We were very pleasantly surprised. The pizza was hot and fresh. Maggie is an excellent and efficient waitress. Thank you Maggie for helping us remember why we used to frequent Mellow Mushroom. We will be back to this location.
PS. Please put your craft beers in frosted goblets. Both of the goblets that my two beers were in were hot and that very quickly negatively affected the taste of my otherwise nice craft beer.

resp.text: We love Maggie also! Thanks for sharing your experience with us TC, we really appreciate it!

name: deb from Travel Mobile
text: Husband's pizza was burnt

name: Bruce Moore
text: Ok, I love their pizza.  I also like the Kentucky Bourbon Ale.  So for that I'll give 4 stars for those reasons.  Although the service has always been friendly I cant always say the same about the timely manner in which I get my food.  Granted....we had a large party both times, but it always seems to happen to me.  Two years in a row they either forgot to put my order in or.....they "burned my pizza".  Tonight I ordered my pizza when everyone else did.  My wife got her order and so did everyone else.  Where. I finally asked about mine the response was that they burned mine.  However.....they made good on it and upgraded my pizza from the 10 inch to the 14 inch at no extra charge.  I'll go back again simply because I live the food.  Basically I'm trying to say is that if it seems like you are waiting a long time for your food....ask.  Otherwise....two thumbs up from me.

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry about your most recent experience Bruce! We will be sure to address your concerns with the front of the house staff to ensure that this problem doesn’t happen again. We appreciate your patience and willingness and hope to see you soon! If another issue like this arises, please ask to speak to a manager, we would love to remedy the situation for you on the spot!

name: Darryl Wallace
text: Great pizza 🍕 and good cold beer 🍺

name: Linda Strausser
text: Usually really love the pizza, but got home and my white pie had red sauce. To lazy to go back and hubby ate the pizza while I had a frozen dinner. Will not order again.

resp.text: We are so sorry to here about your experience with us. We would love to give you the pizza you wanted if you are willing to give us another try. Please email me at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com or give us a call at 251-525-8431 and we can discuss this further.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Best thing here is the patio and sculpture. Servers aren't super friendly. Haven't been back. They were overrun with business though. Not enough parking. Don't have the Tempeh sandwich that they have in ocean springs location. Did get take-out though. Vegan cheese and lots of veggie options. Good dough. Need a thin crust.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome rating Ultreya!

name: SIDECAR RICH
text: Great pizza and service

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars! Come back and see us!

name: Adam Robinson
text: Great Atmosphere and very friendly, helpful staff.  Food was amazing as usual. This was my first visit to this location and I must say this is my new favorite location.  I will definitely be back.

resp.text: AWESOME! This is exactly what we like to hear and hope that your visits stay consistently amazing! Thanks for the feedback Adam!

name: Wendy Tulo
text: Great food. Service was fast and pleasant.

resp.text: You are FIVE stars to us Wendy! We appreciate this awesome rating :)

name: Lynnette Dunham
text: Have to wait way too long this time our puzza crust was burnt! Told me 25 mins and waited 40 mins. But food is usually very good but waiting times are horrible.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the feedback Lynnette! We agree that waiting that long can be VERY difficult (especially when the pizza is so good) but we DEFINITELY appreciate your patience. We will be sure to address the timeliness and also be positive that our servers are a little more accurate with their wait time suggestions!

name: Anna
text: I always get MM when it comes to ordering pizza or calzones. The staff is always friendly, helpful—they get your order quickly, and I've never had them get a iota of an order wrong. The interior is comfortable and artsy without feeling stuffy or lackadaisical. I just love the food and atmosphere. Go there! Tip your servers!

resp.text: This is AMAZING to hear Anna! We appreciate all the positive feedback and thank you for your loyalty! Can’t wait to see you again!

name: musthanggirl1
text:
The pizza was brought out thrown on the pan/ damaged, uncooked. They tried it again, and big huge chunks of onion was on the pizza, still undercooked, and black charcoal chunks stuck under the pizza crust. As they said it was cornmeal. Well it was, but charcoal chunks is what it was. Nonetheless, I paid 24:81 for the pizza, and only got 6 miserable bites. You would think the manager wouldn't have took my money, but charcoal chunks and all, the whole pizza left, she gladly took my money, with a suttle" I'm sorry, will get them to clean the pans". It cost me 24:81 to get you to tell those sloppy sweaty cooks to clean pans? Geez. I will stay home and cook my frozen pizza
The meatball appetizers were cold.

resp.text: I am so sorry to hear about your poor experience with us Sandy. We would love to try and make it right for you. Please contact me at 251-525-8431 or mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com so we can discuss this further. I hope to hear from you soon

name: SIDECAR RICH
text: Jasmin was wonderful as was the 🍕

name: Jerry Stein
text: Pizza was awesome 👌.

name: Robby Smith
text: If only the servers cared about providing good service, they would get 5 stars. Pizzas are always great. Love the Funky Q and the basic pepperoni is fantastic.

resp.text: Oh no! We are so excited to hear that you love our pizzas so much Robby! Of course we want this to be a FIVE star experience for all of our customers so we will discuss your concerns with our front of the house staff. Thank you so much for your input!

name: Myah Olstad
text: Delicious, can handle large crowds very well, military friendly, and food came quick. Decor was original so I rated them very well and you guys should check em out when your in the neighborhood of one of them, they are all over the south and the east coast.

resp.text: This is what we love to hear Myah! Thanks so much for appreciating the decor and SO MANY other things. We appreciate YOU!

name: Denise Bernand
text: We had great time. Calzone were good but needs more meat and cheese. Pretzel bits good. Also Cheese Sauce needs more beer less Water. And Marinara sauce is to Sweet . Less Sugar. All in had Great time.

resp.text: Thanks for all of input Denise and especially for all of those stars! We would like to share that our Beer Sauce does not actually contain water! Just beer and cheese :) We will most definitely pass on the rest of your requests to the kitchen staff though to hopefully improve you future visits!

name: Scott Mcirvin
text: Nice atmosphere. Good food.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Scott! Maybe we can grab all 5 stars next time!

name: angela “Kk” moralis
text: Definitely my fa favorite pizza place!!

resp.text: Thank you Angela! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Sayfideen ibn Yahya
text: Delicious, healthy food for a reasonable price, with excellent service. If you're not a fan of paper straws, I would suggest bringing a reusable one.

resp.text: Thank you for the input Sayfideen! We truly appreciate it!

name: Ashraf Sayyad
text: Stephanie was extremely rude. Probably worst customer service I’ve experienced in my life.

name: Cosmic__NuTT
text: The waitresses are a distraction to the wonderful food

name: Ricky Grandquest
text: Great service  Great pizza.  Very pleased.  Well worth the money

resp.text: Thanks so much for the VERY KIND review Ricky! We appreciate your review!

name: Raymond Varner
text: Bad service

name: Joe Crump
text:
Waitress was great but the bartender is extremely slow. Waited 25 min for beer at our table while our salads were delivered pretty quick.
Bartender needs help!!

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry about your most recent visit with us Joe. We will be sure to address your concerns with our manager at this location to ensure that we are properly staffed during busier times. We would hate for something like this to happen again!

name: BlueCollarGecko
text: Love their pizza here!

resp.text: Thanks for all the stars and amazing review Ryan!

name: Marti Thornton
text: It's ok not the best at it has been before.

name: Frank Kertis
text: Didn't make my pizza correctly. $25 per pie for an incorrect order.

name: Melissa Kaye
text: So,good! Eclectic and fun atmosphere.  They are vegetarian and vegan friendly too! Check them out for sure!

resp.text: This is amazing! We appreciate all the positive feedback Melissa and can’t wait to have you again!

name: James Bauer
text: Great food, super awesome Happy hour, snd the greatest, most friendly staff!!!!!!!!

resp.text: We think you are pretty awesome too Jim!

name: Adam Hamilton
text: Complete lack of leadership tonight in this establishment. The pizza was good. The server however did a good job despite the antics and dawdling service of the management and cook staff

resp.text: Oh no! We definitely don’t like to hear this sort of new Adam! Please give us a call at the store or send us an email so that we can learn of the details of your visit!

name: Lori Trest
text: Very nice. Clean. Friendly staff great food.

resp.text: Thank you Lori! Come back and see us again soon!

name: Shawana Jeter
text: Been here an hour so far and still waiting on a mighty meaty house special. Hate to say it but could have drove to Toms(Ocean Springs)much quicker and better for this amount of time.  I guess the gossip is true....they are.     ... r...e.....a ....l......Mellow

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry to hear about the delay during your most recent visit with us, Shawana! Normally our pizzas take anywhere from 20 to 25 minutes to bake and being baked to order, they could possible take longer depending on the traffic. HOWEVER, we can not really tell what the business may have been like during your visit, and regardless someone should have spoken to you about it at the time. We apologize sincerely and would love to hear more from you. If you could give us a call or send us an email at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com, we would appreciate it!

name: John Lapczynski
text: Food was good, took awhile to get the food to the table. The parking lot is very small so not enough spots for space in the restaurant leading to people parking where ever they find space. Also had a 10 minute wait when you could see lots of open tables.

resp.text: Thanks so much for all the feedback John! We will be sure to take it all into account to become a better experience for you and all in the future!

name: Destiny Dawn
text: This experience was not my favorite, server took app order then someone else brought the app and our server was standing at a counter working a crossword puzzle book. In my opinion not acceptable. Food was delicious, service was not exactly.

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your most recent visit with us! We definitely do like to work as a team in instances where we are busy, but it is definitely not acceptable to play crossword puzzles! We will be sure to address this with our front of house staff to ensure that it doesn’t become an ongoing issue!

name: Janice Thomas
text: Went here for the first time today, and it was great! The waitresses were very nice and kind.  They have a great selection of pizzas, I ordered a vegan pizza with a cheese substitute. It was good!

resp.text: This is so amazing to hear! We really appreciate your feedback Janice and can’t wait to have you dine in with us again!

name: Elizabeth Johnston
text: So much fun! Clean restaurant with fast, friendly service and yummy pizza! I love their pizza crust. Kids' serving sizes were good and delicious, too.

resp.text: We are so glad to hear that you had so much fun during your visit! Thanks for the review Elizabeth!

name: Austin Noland
text: Awesome place!

name: jesse wilkins
text: Terrible waitress and pizza does not taste amazing like the one in Daphne and all

name: Ivy Hill
text: They have the best stone baked pizza and the building is beautiful. I always enjoy eating at this Mellow Mushroom!

resp.text: This is wonderful to hear! We are so glad you enjoy your experience during your visits with us Ivy!

name: Brian M
text:
Good beer selection (when they don’t run out of it) & decent non-traditional pizza.

Do not recommend the chicken wings - they were the smallest I had ever seen at a restaurant with very little meat.

Service is good at the bar. Not so much at the tables.

resp.text: We are glad you enjoy the beer and pizza Brian! We appreciate your review and will definitely take all of your concerns into consideration!

name: James Brokaw
text: Super slow service

name: Paris All Lives Matter-Blessings to All
text: First time dining at Mellow Mushroom!! My husband and I enjoyed the spinach and artichoke appetizer and House Special pizza!! Amanda was our server, she was very nice and great customer service. All the workers were pleasant. We had fun taking pics before leaving to go back to our hotel. Fun atmosphere and great food!! 5 Stars!!

resp.text: What a great choice in pizza. The House Special is one of our FAVORITES! Thanks you so much for the amazing review, we truly appreciate it!

name: Daniel Kenmar
text: Took 15 minutes to get a waiter and that’s because I had to ask for one. Didn’t get a refill until the end of my meal. Took an hour to get in, get seated, get one pizza, pay, and leave. Waiter kept the pocket change for himself. 2 stars because at least the pizza was good but honestly the worst service I’ve had here in a long time.

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry to learn about your most recent experience with us. We apologize for the long wait and lack of communication from our front of the house staff. On regular days, our pizza takes about 20 to 25 minutes to make as they are baked to order. On busier days, longer waits can be expected but this should have definitely been communicated to you. We appreciate your feedback and would love to hear more from your visit. Please reach out to us via email or phone call so that we can chat!

name: Vanessa Madere
text: It took a while to get our food but it was a busy night and worth the wait!

resp.text: Thank you so much for being so understanding! We appreciate your review Vanessa!

name: Morgan Williams
text: I ordered a loaded potato pizza. It’s one of their best pizzas but when I got it, the red potatoes that came on it were still hard. They tasted like they weren’t even cooked. It really bummed me out...

resp.text: Hi Morgan.  So sorry to hear you had a sub par experience with us.  Would you mind reaching out to mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com with a brief description of you experience so that we can resolve your issue?  Thank you.

name: Kathy Thorne
text: The service was slow, we waited for about 40 mins for our pizza, they were not very busy and my pizza was not the best, it had very little stuff on it. I've had better service before.

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry to learn about your most recent experience with us Kathy! Please give the store a call or send an email to share more details about your visit. We apologize sincerely and appreciate your input!

name: Bailee Ladnier
text: This particular location of Mellow mushroom particularly stands out because of their unique staff and off-the-chain dishes. I honestly could live off of their pizza! Quality ingredients, excellent service, all you could ask for. Definitely go here!! (The buffalo chicken pizza is bomb!)

resp.text: So honored to be considered "off-the-chain". Thanks for the kindest of words Bailee!

name: SHANTE jones
text: My first time visiting, it was a great experience.

resp.text: Thank you for 5 stars! We want all of our guests to have great experience! Please come visit us soon!

name: Laura Crabtree
text: Nice atmoshere, great service and excellent food.

resp.text: This is EXACTLY what we like to hear! Thanks so much Laura!

name: Naima René
text:
Great service, great food. I love it so much!
Our waiter was the best and so very kind! Sadly, I forgot the woman's name.

resp.text: Oh that's awesome to hear Naima! We will pass it along regardless and let our servers no how amazing of a time you had! Thanks for sharing :)

name: Dwayne Tippery
text: Great pizza and great atmosphere. Also great selection of beers on tap.

resp.text: We are thrilled to hear that everything was GREAT for you Dwayne! Thanks so much for the AMAZING review!

name: Mary Junkin
text: Great food and service! I've had bad service here before but our server this time was so nice and thoughtful. She made sure my dietary restrictions were met and offered suggestions. My sandwich was super tasty! I had enough to take home and have a snack later.

resp.text: We love to accommodate diets of all sorts! Thank you SO much for giving us another chance and for leaving this AMAZING review!

name: Tony Scarbrough
text: A great place to get fat and drunk.

name: Richard DePascale
text: Good craft beer selection, satisfying food, and friendly service in a funky atmosphere.

resp.text: Thanks so much for all of those stars Richard! We appreciate your amazing review!

name: Roy R.
text: The quirky building and great location finally tempted me to visit last Sunday (early March) and I ordered a pizza. When it arrived after a curiously long wait, it was a bit dried out and the  crust was a bit tough. I had to wonder how long it was ready before it was finally brought to my table. Frankly, the sauce was a bit bland, the cheese was a bit thin, and the toppings were a bit sparse, it was not piping hot, and I've already mentioned the crust. I'll give them another try to see if it was a fluke, but the tables on both sides of me were visited at one point by servers apologizing for separate issues. That makes three tables in a row that were unhappy about something. Maybe next time will be just right.

resp.text: Oh no! That definitely doesn’t seem like a visit that was up to Mellow standards. We are sorry for your experience with us and we would love to try to address your concerns. If you could give us a call or send us an email at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com, we’d greatly appreciate the feedback!

name: Monika Johnson
text: Loved my server; she was attentive and friendly. Overall the food was really great; I ordered the great white pizza with the original crust. The crust was perfectly done and it had a great flavor. My friend ordered a calzone and it was packed with fillings. In my experience at other places, the fillings in calzones are usually kind of skimpy.

resp.text: This is wonderful to hear Monika! Thank YOU for taking the time to leave such an amazing review!

name: Leigh Discenza
text: We already knew that they have great pizza because we love our MM back home. We also already knew that they have an excellent craft beer list. The location on Schillinger did not disappoint. And in fact, while I didn't get her name, our server was awesome. As soon as she found out we were beer snobs, she talked to us about local beers on the list, what we should find in the area and brought us samples of things we shouldn't miss. We've never had a bad experience at Mellow Mushroom, but she raised the bar.

resp.text: This is EXACTLY what we like to hear Leigh! It's so nice that you were able to feel welcome and at home. Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us and we can't wait to have you again!

name: Carol Hunt
text: Pizza is always hot and delicious! We get salad and share since it is so big. Service is great as well. Very attentive and polite.

resp.text: This is EXACTLY what we love to hear Carol! Thanks so much for the amazing review!

name: Randy Blocker
text: Food and service great as always!

name: Maggie Hughes
text: Super awesome pizza! We ordered the pretzles as well SO GOOD!!

resp.text: Great choice with the pretzels, and thank YOU for the amazing review!

name: Alan Duncan
text: Love this place. Prices are fair and the selection is great. Close to my house so that helps too!  :)

resp.text: Thanks so much for the amazing review Alan! We love all of the positive feedback!

name: John Baker
text: I love the lunch buffet! This is definitely the best Mellow in Mobile. Moreover, the service has always been great and I have enjoyed the multiple times I have eaten here.

resp.text: We are so glad to hear that you are enjoying the buffet! Thanks so much for the wonderful review John!

name: Elizabeth Pellegrin
text: I absolutely love coming to this place. Courtney is my favorite bartender and really makes all her guests feel welcome. Drinks are creative and delicious. Happy hour for lunch and drinks is great. Food is delicious. All portions big enough to share. I come here about once a week and have never had a bad experience.

resp.text: Thanks Elizabeth! We love Courtney too! We appreciate all of the kind words and can't wait to have you join us again!

name: Tommie Williams
text: Great locations!!!!!! Good Customer Service!!!! Going back soon!!!!!!

name: kathryn smith
text: I love their pizza. So many great veggie and vegan options. One if these days I'll try their sandwiches because I hear they are good too. I'm just always craving pizza the second I see the place.

resp.text: The struggle is REAL! We appreciate your loyalty though and can't wait to see you again!

name: Barbara Holladay
text:
Had never been to a Mellow Mushroom before going to a new one in Mobile, Alabama's with a friend. Great pizza, really nice ambiance, a pretty place to relax.
Owned by Chad Hicks.
Now we have one in Denton, Texas and it is just as great!

resp.text: This is wonderful to hear! Thanks for sharing Barbara!

name: Andrew Bouchard
text: Great place

name: Mike Smith
text: We ordered through Waitr and I understand the policy is not to notify Waiter until they arrive that you cannot fulfill our order. What would be the problem that when you get the order and you cannot complete it notify Waiter so I could have change our order and not delay it for 45 minutes. This a horrible experience. I will never order delivery through your company. Even though you credited the item you could not make. It’s the whole experience that was horrible. I believe someone should review your policy if you plan to use a delivery service. I’m so disappointed in this experience.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your input Mike! We apologize about the inconveniences that occurred during your most recent experience and will try to address your concerns! We know things can be made difficult with third party delivery services and we will try to make sure that everyone is on the same page. If you could give us a call or send us an email at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com, we’d love to discuss further!

name: Jeff Normandin
text: Good portions need more friendly service

resp.text: Thank you for the 4 stars, we will work harder to get all 5 next time!

name: Robert Hughes
text:
We decided to try this Mellow Mushroom for the lunch buffet. It was a huge disappointment. We arrived around noon and there was a single slice of pizza on the buffet. We loaded up on salad and waited for pizza... And waited... And waited. People started to complain and we decided to order a pizza instead of waiting any longer.

In the ~1 hour we were there two pizzas were put on the buffet and quickly claimed by the dozen or so people waiting. Definitely not worth the extra drive for something that doesn't deserve to be called a buffet. More like a salad bar. No soups, no breads, and- for most of our visit- no pizza.

Our waitress was nice enough and the pizza we ordered after we got tired of waiting was great. Next time we'll skip the longer drive and hit up the one nearer to us for our pizza. And if we decide we want a buffet we'll go to Cici's.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear about your experience with us Robert! The buffet is a new thing for us that we are tweaking to get just right. It's hard to determine just how many people might attend. Currently, with it being fairly new, attendance hasn't been high, so we hate to make a bunch of pizzas just to get thrown away. In your situation though, this is something that seems to be an issue that could have been prepared for and we are sorry for that! We apologize sincerely and appreciate your feedback. We will keep these concerns in mind for our future buffet days! Thanks so much and we hope you could give us another try!

name: Jam War
text: This is the best service we have ever had at mellow mushroom! We got seated immediately, every one seemed very happy and were very kind to us and our children. We will definitely be back.😃

resp.text: This is wonderful news Justin and Mary! We are glad to hear that you had such a nice experience with us and thank you for the AMAZING review!

name: Alan Slatky
text: Very good selection of craft beers. Had the burger excellent quality of meat, very good flavor. It's a very relaxing atmosphere

resp.text: You are 5 stars to us Alan! thanks for the rating!

name: April McLeod
text: Excellent Food, Very Friendly and Competent Staff, Beautiful Funky Interior with many local artists represented. A fun experience, very reasonably-priced. We had a mushroom pizza, the white pizza, Artichoke Dip, and Bruschetta. Everything was delicious! I got my veteran's discount, as well. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks for this awesome review April! And good choice on all those dishes, the White Pizza is one of our favorites too! We can't wait to see you again!

name: Scott Jones
text: I've always frequented Midtown Mellow, love it but I wanted to venture west to see the new Mellow.  It's beautiful.  Fast, friendly servers.  Kick-ass bathrooms.  Try the wings slightly crispy.  My fave.

resp.text: Woah Scott! Thanks for all those stars and such an amazing review! Good choice with the wings :)

name: Kenyon Johnson
text: My first and last visit to this location. Decided to take my family out for a nice evening after church. To come in and seated at not one dirty table but two . After sitting for 15 min we decided to leave . I was told to try the Old Shell  or Airport location instead

resp.text: Hi Kenyon! We are so sorry for your most recent experience with us! We appreciate your feedback and will be sure to notify the general manger of your visit. Sometimes when we are a bit busy, it becomes more difficult to keep up with the traffic, but it is no excuse for your time with us and we truly apologize for that. Please feel free to reach out with a manager directly via email and we hope to see you again.

name: Jonathan Salata
text: Sorry hostess, bad service

name: Janice Files
text: Oh. Wow. You removed my detailed HORRIBLE  experience here......

resp.text: Oh no! We hate to see that your most recent visit with us was only worth two stars Janice! Please feel free to give the store a call or to send us an email at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com to give us more details about your experience!

name: Gary Scovil
text: Holy Shitake Pizza and pretty barmaid.

resp.text: Wonderful review Gary! Thank you so much!

name: Ragan Jones
text: Food and service were great! Unfortunately, on this particular night, there was some kind of trivia game going, very loudly, across the entire restaurant, despite there only being a few tables that seemed to be playing. It was extremely difficult to converse with my family, party of 7, that was there to celebrate a birthday. Wasn't prepared for Tuesday trivia. Check before you go if that matters to you.

resp.text: Thanks for the input Ragan! We appreciate it. We will be sure to keep this in mind for our future trivia events!

name: KC Case
text: Tasty well cooked pizza and fresh Greek salad were more than fine. I like their large repertoire of grog. Einstok Icelandic Toasted Porter became a favorite for me.

resp.text: This is awesome to hear! Thanks for sharing your experience with us KC!

name: Solomon Moreno
text: Great service and food was hot and pizza tasted fresh along with salad that looked and tasted fresh as well. We took advantage of buffet and the spread was delightful.  Our server was sweet and helpful, quick and courteous.

resp.text: This is AMAZING to hear Solomon! We are so glad that you are enjoying our buffet as much as we are. We can't wait to have you back!

name: elizabeth burns
text: The atmosphere was amazing, it really captured the nautical theme....being that we r on the gulf coast. The service was outstanding. Although, our second pizza took way longer due to having to go to local store for bbq sauce and then they burnt it. But the manager comped it without 7s having to say something. So, no worries. We were already full anyways. It did seem as if the pizzas didn't have much toppings, co suffering the other locations put WAY more toppings.

resp.text: Customer satisfaction is our most important value! We are so glad that you left happy and hope that you come visit again.Thanks for the review Elizabeth!

name: Lisa Watkins
text: Food is flavorful & well-prepared. Good beer selection.  Stephanie is our favorite bartender/server.

resp.text: That is AWESOME to hear! Thanks for the amazing review Lisa!

name: Juan Hernandez
text: awesome place not enough parking though

resp.text: Thanks for sharing with us Juan! We agree about the parking and are hoping to fix this problem in the future. We appreciate your input!

name: daddy mac
text: Oh yea.. so good, fresh mozzeralla. IF A REAL PIZZA WITH A REAL CRUST IS WHAT YOU WANT ... TRY THE PIZZA,  ITS THE BEST AROUND

resp.text: What an honor! We appreciate the AMAZING review Dan!

name: Jeremy Albritton
text: I'm only giving 2 stars because the manager was very nice when I called. We sat outside and for ten to 15 minutes, and never got a server. They waited on people on both sides of us who had arrived after us but never acknowledged we were there. I went to the hostess to ask what the deal was and she sat three other people  before she asked me what I wanted. I had enough and we left. I called the manager and she apologized and offered to buy our meal but I wasn't going back in there because we parked so far away. I've never eaten there so I have know idea if it's good.

resp.text: Jeremy we are so sorry to hear about your experience with us! We are sorry that your expectations were not met. We are thankful that a manager tried their best to remedy the situation but would love for you to give us another shot! Please feel free to call the store again, or to send us an email. Thanks for your input, we appreciate it!

name: vin distefano
text:
Outstanding as the first time I tried MM over 10 years ago (in KY, I think).
In addition to a pizza, I ordered a Caesar salad with bacon. The bacon was 6 WHOLE, fresh, crispy strips. This alone made the whole order worthwhile.
Thanks, Mellow Mushroom folks!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review! Great choice with eh Caesar salad, and especially with the added bacon :) We hope to see you again soon!

name: Dr. Steve
text: It was absolutely wonderful! The staff was very helpful and very kind. Definitely a place that I would revisit.

resp.text: It's so nice to hear you had a pleasant experience with us! Thanks for the review and we can't wait to see you again!

name: Melissa Smith
text:
I have always enjoyed Mellow Mushroom but I have to say you disappointed me today. I ordered the veggie calzone and added pepperoni. This is one of my favorite dishes there. When it came, the outside was cooked perfectly, but the pepperoni was raw and cold. Not room temperature, refrigerator cold. I told my server and she asked if I wanted it remade. I did. The second one came to the table in the same condition. At this point, I was done. I told her to just take it back and I would go. She brought the manager over,  who said yes it was cold, thier oven must not be working properly and took it off the bill and then presented me with a check for my soda.
I have been in the service industry all my life and I have never seen a customer charged for a fountain drink when thier order was botched. I rarely complain in restaurants because I understand how demanding the job is and I tip well because I appreciate good service.  Charging me 2.69 for a soda I drank a quarter of after failing to cook my order twice seems cheap and passive agressive. I know that fountain drinks are considered a throwaway and if I had ordered an alcoholic drink I would not have thought twice about paying for it. This just seems like poor customer service and almost punitive. I am very unhappy with the Mellow for the first time.

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry to hear about your most recent experience with us Melissa. This is definitely not up to our standards and though we tried to remedy the situation, we definitely lacked in fulfilling that task entirely! Our general manager is currently out of the state to further in training with the corporation, and it is possible that her fill in might have let it slip their mind. It is DEFINITELY not an excuse however and we sincerely apologize. We will be sure to address your concerns with the general manager and if you’d like for them to reach out to you upon their return, please send us an email at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com.

name: Mary Miller
text: VERY SLOW!!! It took 45 minutes for my medium pizza to arrive at my table. We arrived at 12:55 pm. Pizza arrived at 1:40.

resp.text: I am so sorry to hear about your slow experience with us Mary. Unfortunately we have been severely under staffed throughout this pandemic and are struggling to keep up with the volume we have with our dine in and take out orders. We are constantly striving to be faster and more diligent and we are very sorry for dropping the ball this time. We love for you to give us another try.  Please contact me at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com and maybe we can discuss this further.

name: Amy Smith
text: We’re never disappointed here. I love that me and my husband can order one pizza and each pick out our own half. They even let you do a different base on each side.

resp.text: Yes! We support your creativity! Thanks for the feedback Amy, we really appreciate it!

name: Dick Terpstra
text: We've visited many Mellow Mushroom locations, and like all of them this location has its own unique character. Love their pizza, especially the House Special. Respectable tap list, although I think they could rotate different beers in more often. Seems just a little understaffed at times, so service may be slow(er).

resp.text: Thanks for the review Dick! We appreciate all of the input and can't wait to see you again!

name: Chris Slater
text: Had the mushroom thingy pizza (sorry, don't recall the name). Terrific.

resp.text: AWESOME! We believe you’re speaking of the Holy Shiitake and we couldn’t agree more. One of our FAVORITES! Thanks for the review Chris!

name: byron wilmoth
text: Great fun!  Amazing pizza and energetic servers.

resp.text: Awesome! This is wonderful to hear. Thanks for sharing your experience with us Byron!

name: Gordon Sanders
text: Pizza was great!  Waitress was more interested in hanging out with co workers than providing good service.

resp.text: Oh no! This isn’t what we like to hear at all Gordon! Please give us a call at the store or send us an email at mobile3_al@mellowmushroominfo.com so that we can remedy this situation!

name: Amy Horton
text: The service was great & so was our food. My husband an I took our 4 yr old grandaughter out to dinner. She loved her flatbread pizza and sliced apples. She asked for more.😊  Our pizza was fresh & delicious. We will be back.

resp.text: Oh man what a dream! The flatbread pizza is definitely a fan favorite. Thanks for sharing your experience with us, we appreciate all of the feedback. Can’t wait to have you again Amy!

name: jeff yoe
text: Great pizza and atmosphere.   Our favorite pizza place.

resp.text: Wonderful to hear! Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us Jeff!

name: Jonathan Williams
text:
Have to admit I don't really care for pizza
, but I love LOVE the Mellow Mushrooms Pizza. It's Gourmet need I say more. I can't believe I'm just now trying this place. WOW I'll be back! If you have never been, GO!!!

resp.text: And we can't wait to have you back Jonathan! Thanks for giving us a shot and for leaving such an AMAZING review!

name: Sellers Channel
text: I love the pizza but both times I have called in a pickup It took right at an hour to get my food!!

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry about the timeliness with your recent orders! Please feel free to give us a call or send a direct message so that we can address your concerns personally. Thanks so much for bringing this to our attention, we do appreciate it!

name: cynthia grahan
text: The wings are awesome. Pizza is fresh and great. Roomy seating, friendly staff and great service.

resp.text: Just what we like to hear. Thanks for the kind words Cynthia!

name: Jason and Dionne Leapley
text: Great service, Excellent Food, clean and neat location!

resp.text: AWESOME! Thanks for sharing, Leapley family!

name: Kameron Green
text: We ate at this particular location last night. Let me start by saying the food was great, as expected from eating at this chain in other locations. The food deserves 5 stars in my book and I'm very picky about pizza. Now for the bad. The restaurant was packed , understandably due to it just opening however, with over 50 tables you would think they would have more parking. We ended up parking in a dirt lot between it's parking lot and the place next to it. We spent between 2 and 2 and a half hours there a hour waiting for our pizza and 15 minutes eating. The remainder of the 45 minutes spent waiting for whatever we requested from our waitress who was slow and forgetful. She also brought my 3 yr old sons drink in a bar glass then proceeded to say she wasn't sure if it could be transferred to a to go cup but was willing to bring me a cup to pour it in. After 30 minutes of waiting and asking multiple times I gave up and asked a different waitress for a cup. She didn't take our menus till the end of the meal. She took our orders and we waited 15minutes  for them after already being their and seated for a minimum of 10minutes she brought out the appetizers and still had not brought any of us the water we asked for when we first sat down. This is not acceptable service in my book. I will be eating their again bc the food was so good however I will be requesting a different server if sat in her section.

resp.text: Hey Kameron! Thanks for the review! We will be sure to address this situation and would appreciate your second chance. Just how you have been so understanding of our business due to the grand opening, we hope that you can understand that for many of these servers, it's also something new. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service and hope to show you that in the future!

name: Brandon Ezell
text: This was my fist time eating at this location. It is only a few months old, and the building is really nice. The food was a good as any other location, and the service was excellent.

resp.text: Woah, thanks for the AWESOME review Brandon! We appreciate your patience and your kind words!

name: byron wilmoth
text: Great fun!  Amazing pizza and energetic servers.

resp.text: Awesome! This is wonderful to hear. Thanks for sharing your experience with us Byron!

text: Great service, food and atmosphere at this location. We reserved a team for trivia and they had a table waiting for us. I was impressed.

resp.text: That's awesome to hear! Hopefully you join us for next month's themed trivia!!! Thanks for the wonderful review Sara - John!

text: Order 1/2 a salad. Portion is big. Enlightened Salad is great. Best pizzas are the Cosmic Karma if you love feta or the Great White with olive oil, garlic and basil.

resp.text: Oh great choice Aleta! Thanks for leaving such an amazing review :)

name: Justine Montes
text: Best place to get pizza

resp.text: What an honor! Thanks so much for sharing with us Justine!

name: Brittany E
text: Everyone is incredibly friendly at this location, and the inside design is amazing. Plus, all day happy hour on sunday is definitely worth a trip to this restaurant.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your experience with us Brittany! We love to make our customers feel welcome!

name: Krystal Littrell
text: I will never eat here. I work for a delivery service where we pick up food from restaurants and I visited this location 3 times in one night. The only thing pleasant were the three girls standing by the door who greeted me. My 3 orders all had 14 minute windows and with all three of my orders I ended up waiting and additional 15 minutes for customers foods. My last order towards 10pm ended up being 20 minutes late and while standing at the bar waiting for the other half of the order groups of employees were at the bar with two bartenders gossiping about the workers in the kitchen and another group was behind me folding silverware gossiping. Not once did any of the fill me in or ask me about what I was still waiting on. This experience has deterred any future plans I had of visiting this location. The one on Old Shell had nicer workers and spoke to me throughout my whole pick up process. Again, this review is based solely on my experience picking up orders not my experience dining in and eating there.

resp.text: Krystal we are so sorry to hear about your experience with us! We definitely do not tolerate this sort of behavior from our staff and we sincerely apologize for you time. We appreciate your input and will inform our staff so that we can ensure that something like this doesn't happen again. Hopefully you will give us a shot!

name: Jody Mallinson
text: Best pizza  joint in town.  They have a lot more then pizza.  Salad huge even the small can be shared.  Sandwhiches just totally fun and good

resp.text: We are glad to hear you're enjoying our menu Jody! Thanks so much for the wonderful review!

text: It was loud music and salad was nothing more than lettuce. Waitress was fine.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback Flo! We will be sure to address your concerns and be more mindful about the volume of the music! Please feel free to give us a call at the store or to send us an email so that we can figure out what might have went wrong with your salad. We appreciate input of all kind!

resp.text: Thanks you for your patience and understanding Keisha! We know your next experiences will just get better! We appreciate your kind review and hope to see you soon!

name: MAC

name: Darlene Wolfe
text: The new Mellow Mushroom is beautiful.  Our waitress was good,  food was very good, but they didn't have any side for my hamburger except chips,  not acceptable.

resp.text: Hey Darlene! We appreciate your feedback and hope to offer you some further side options in the future! Our menu is a corporate decision based on what does well in our Mobile area. We will be sure to share your feedback with them! Thanks again :)

name: Alex Brotze
text: Food was great service was very slow waited almost 15mins till waiter finally ask what we wanted to drink. Greaters acted rude at first like they didn't want us there till I cracked a joke then they perked up. Tables are way to small for 2people with a large pizza.

resp.text: We appreciate the feedback Alex! We apologize for your experience and will be sure to address your concerns with our staff. We agree that sometimes there just isn't enough table space for those larger pizzas, but we like to have options for those who might only want a smaller food item. Thanks again and we will be sure to work towards these improvements!

name: Jeff N
text: I took my wife here for the first time. We went around dinner time and it was a little busy when we arrived. It slowly started to die out. We ordered drinks and some wings as appetizers. Then we placed an order for a medium House Special pizza. About 45 minutes in, we already finished out wings and my wife also finished her pint of beer; we were waiting on our pizza still. We asked our server if our pizza was ready and she went to check. She brought out a large pizza and placed it on the table. I looked at it and said, that's not our pizza. She took it back. My wife at this point was pretty frustrated because we were both pretty hungry. Almost 5 mins later she brings out our pizza. She explained that they put our pizza into a to-go box and got it mixed up with someone else's order. I can tell the pizza was probably sitting in the to-go box awhile because our pizza didn't taste fresh. At this point, we were not going to wait longer to get another fresh pizza. The food was good but they need to work on the kitchen and service of this restaurant. No one wants to wait almost an hour for pizza.

resp.text: Jeff we are so sorry to hear about your most recent experience with us! We aren't sure what the issue might have been with the service or timeliness that day but we will be sure to address these topics with our staff. We appreciate your feedback and hope that you could give us another shot!

name: Charletta S. Sanders
text: Great food not so friendly staff!!!, and that really matters to customers that are coming for the first time.

resp.text: That’s so sad to hear Charletta! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the pizza but we will be sure to address your concern with the staff about their not so friendly approach. We appreciate your feedback and hope to be better for you in the future!

name: Penny Claiborne
text: This location is always out of something. First time I went to eat here they were out of the gluten free crusts. Next time they did not have Tito's vodka. This time they were all out of Angry Orchard beer. Probably won't go back to this location, will go to one of the others.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Penny! With your input we are able to make sure these issues don't happen any more. We're trying our best to keep everything stocked, and with it just being over half a year of our opening, there are still some things that we are learning about our inventory. We thank you for your patience and hope that you can give us another try!

text: The pizza and salad are always good and the service is 👌.

resp.text: That’s WONDERFUL to hear! Thanks for the awesome review Michelle!

resp.text: Thanks for the review Julia! We appreciate your patience and will be sure to discuss this with ALL of our staff to make sure everyone is on the same page. We hope to see you again!

Like I said GREAT PIZZA but TERRIBLE SERVICE. I will not be returning to this location.

name: Gregory Rawls
text: I dont eat eat pizza out, generally, but when i do, it is either Papa Murphys, or Mellow Mushroom.  This was my first experience with the lunch buffet at MM.  I dont do buffets, but i decided to give this a try, since there were very few people and no children (ie. Less coughing on and touching of the food).  The salad bar was very good, with a good selection of items.  The pizza, however, was just as i suspected...overcooked, old, and bland.  It was no different than any other pizza from anywhere else.  I should have stuck with the salad, or ordered a freshly cooked, made to order pizza.  I would recommend MM, but would NOT recommend the lunch buffet.  BTW...I only noticed one other table beside mine that ate the buffet, and with good reason.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Gregory! We have changed things up with our lunch specials and buffet due to the demand of our customers. We would love to hear what you think about this new offer! Please feel free to send us an email or to give us a call to discuss your visit with us a little more!

text: I have ate at mellow  many times and enjoyed it so i wanted my husband  to try it .....it was his very first time and it was horrible service  it took for ever for someone to take our drink orders the two girls at the front when u come in the door were not very friendly then it took 25 min to get our food for it to not be good at all very unhappy and want go back 😞😞 the guy sitting beside us even sent his food back by the way also

resp.text: Oh no! We are so sorry to hear that your experience with us was not a great one. Our pizzas have a normal bake time of 20 to 25 minutes, but we aren't sure if that is what you ordered?We will be sure to address this concern with our staff to ensure your visits with us will be consistent and enjoyable. Please reach out to us via email or phone call to speak further with a manager!

name: Wes Allday
text: Pizza was good, as with most MM’s. Had to ask to be moved to the other side of the restaurant though because all the overhead lighting on one side was flickering at a nauseating pace. Server was polite, but ghosted us most of the time even though there was only a half-dozen other people in the restaurant (on a Friday night). Had to ask a couple at a table near us to borrow their salt because none was on any other tables and server was absent for an extended period after dropping our food and running. Kind of disappointing experience considering this is a brand new MM.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that your visit with us wasn’t up to OUR standards as well Wes! Friday nights can be a bit busy but we aren’t sure what could have been this issue with your particular instance. We will be sure to address all of your concerns with our front and back of the house staff to ensure something like this does not happen again for any of or customers! We appreciate your input!

text: This place don't have much flavor and is pricey. It takes to long to get your food.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that your most recent experience with us was only worth one star Victor! Our pizzas are baked to order and on a normal night take roughly 20 to 25 minutes to bake. We hope that yours wasn't too much longer than that and would love to hear more about your experience if so. We want to ensure that this doesn't happen again and will be discussing these issues with our staff. Please feel free to give us a call or to send an email!

name: Angela Mosley
text: Worst place in mobile to eat. After ordering a drink I was told they were out of that alcohol. Asked for a different drink and the bartender didn't know how to make it and wouldn't even consider looking it up. So I asked for a rum and sprite. The bartender put Malibu in a rum and sprite. Sent that back. We have been waiting for 30 mins only to be told that our food is just now going in the oven. My waitress tells me that they are under staffed and that she is sorry for our wait. We will never be back .

resp.text: Angela we are so sorry to hear about your most recent experience with us. We want our guests to feel welcomed and comfortable and it is clear that you did not. Our pizzas are baked to order, so sometimes can take up to 40 minutes during our busier times! We aren't sure what might have been going on during YOUR visit but we will be sure to address your concerns in the best way possible. Please feel free to reach out to us in a personal message via email or phone call. Thank you, we appreciate your input!

text: I only give one star because you have to.... Ate buffet on fri... It was horrible... No pizza on bar ... 40 ppl in resturant waiting for pizza so when they put one out it was gone before everyone waiting could get a piece... Salad bar was dirty and unkept.... Mentioned it to server... She gave excuse that they prepare it fresh...  I literally paid 9.99 each for 2 peices of pizza .... And the pizza was no better than cicis....

resp.text: Amanda we are so sorry to hear that your experience with us was not up to our standards. During our lunches we do offer our normal menu as well, we just like to have the buffet as an option to our guests. Our pizzas are baked to order, which normally takes 20 to 25 minutes and sometimes longer depending on how busy the restaurant is. We can only hope that during your visit the pizzas had JUST been removed to be replaced with new ones. Either way, we are sorry that this wasn't communicated to you and we apologize sincerely! We would love to hear more details about your visit so please call us or send us an email directly!

text: If the review was based on just food and drinks I'd be giving them a solid 5 stars. My group of 5 got sat in a round booth. The girl who ended up being a server didn't even mention how long it taken her to get to our table (35 minutes at least) which is what I was really shocked by. text: Slow service even with just 3 other tables.  No pizza on buffet - 1 1/2 pizzas at Noon???  Weird pizzas that they put out finally - just did not taste good at all - soggy - weird combos etc

resp.text: Twylla, we are so sorry for you experience with us! We do offer a unique assortment of pizza combinations, but do not fret, you do have the option to build your own pizza as well! Please be aware that we encourage creativity, and you are able to build a pizza HOWEVER you'd like! So if a pizza that we have already designed does not sound appetizing to you, we are perfectly ok with you building your own :) As of now a pizza buffet is not something that we offer, due to our standard of baking. Every order is made to order, and having them on a buffet would only make them less fresh, less up to our standards, and more soggy. Either way, this does not qualify your less than great experience with us and we truly apologize! Please feel free to send us an email so that we can address your concerns on a personal level!

text: They allow dogs to be on the inside.

resp.text: Edie! Thank you so much for your input! While most restaurants these days allow dogs inside, we unfortunately do not. We will allow a pet inside ONLY if it is a service animal, but that is it. We can't even allow dogs to sit on the patio at this location because the only way to get to the patio is by entering through the restaurant, which again, we do not allow. If there is ever a time that you notice a dog inside and it is not a service animal, please notify a manager :)

text: This was so trash that I had to one star it just so I could write a review, because one of my friends who worked here told me that he saw the MANAGER swapping labels on things that were out of date and still selling it to the customers (we bring our kids here) . And multiple times I’ve been there trying to hopefully give them a chances and  it’s like every sandwhich I get has bad lettuce, it’s more of a yellow color rather than the nice green color I expect to have on my sandwich, and you definitely can taste the weird mildew-y taste. And honestly I’d rather there be another restaurant there, one that actually cares about there customers and there employees who are trying to make money but have to do whatever the managers say so there gaining a bad reputation just working at this place.
