name: Kimberly Young
text: AWESOME PLACE GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE..

name: April Brockmiller
text: I do not like McDonals anymore. That food is always soggy and over priced.

name: Valessa Carr
text: My last visit to McDonald's wasn't good at all. Longer than usual wait time in drive thru line. Never adequate enough supply on popular drinks. Food was not good

name: Dr.David Callaway
text: (Warning)This place the worse I have ever been in. Very long wait time, and there alarms in back is always  going off.Very loud. All the employees just let them beeping.Need better control. And turn them alarms down.We got a headache after 30 minutes from the  sound.They need management bad.

name: Harvey Mellard Jr
text: Not usually a fan of eating here, but stopping in for a quick breakfast is certainly convenient and delicious. I don't normally have time to make something for breakfast on my way to my weekend drill for the Guard. So, stopping in here is convenient as it's on the way, and the food is good

name: dwayne hawkins
text: Not as good from when I was a kid

name: Wanda Fields-Piepho
text: It was ok at one time.  The food now is half on bun, not fresh-the bun is stale, ask for light or no tartar and get a ton that squishes out of the side and ask for diet coke and get coke.  If you go back through the drive-thru and say something about your order, you get attitude.  Last trip there.

name: Brooke Allo
text: Fast & Fresh today!

name: Roger Redd
text: Rude employees,,,,,nasty smell inside. Food nothing to write home about. But the younger kids love it. Something in the food is addictive.  Drive thru is never right. Either food is cold or something is missing. No more McDonald's

name: BRIAN JOHNSON
text:
Undeniably the worst service in my 41 years of eating. It’s easier and faster to buy a car or house than it is to buy a happy meal at this McDonald’s.

name: Joel Sterling
text: Went inside to order since the drive thru was so backed up. Got inside and discovered the same back up with several customers milling about, trying to find a non-existent line and waiting for thier orders. No one was at the cash register for several minutes and I contemplated just leaving and going somewhere else (the smell of French fries kept me there!). I was finally able to place my order and eventually get my food. The food was fresh and hot, but the staff was in disarray and clearly  frazzled by the rush. Customers were getting the wrong orders handed to them and chaos with a side of pandemonium was the special of the day. One lady told the cashier that she had been waiting for over 30 min (can't verify that story though) Fortunately, my order was correct and I was in and out within 15 minutes or so....not my idea of FAST food, but at least it was hot and tasty. My advice? Don't try to eat there between 11:30 and 12:30 week days...you will probably be waiting there for a while, so pack a lunch. ;-)

name: W. Ross Artley
text:
Stopped by on my way back to Atlanta. Line was long in the drive-thru, so I went into the store. There were a lot of customers waiting for food. I understand that the location was unexpectedly busy, but the service I got was bad. After I ordered, I heard that some customers were waiting for over 20 minutes for their food. Luckily, mine did not take that long, but it still took approx 15 minutes.

The real issue I had is with the food. I ordered a a Signature Sriracha Chicken Sandwich and four butter milk chicken tenders. The chicken sandwich was made with a McChicken patty, which is much smaller than the crispy chicken breast. Also, that was lukewarm at best. There were no crispy straws on this sandwich nor was there cheese.

The chicken tenders were all very small and fairly soft. I did get four of them, but they were all very small. One was about the size of my thumb, at best. I would say three and a half, to be generous. They were not crispy or flaky like normal when getting the buttermilk, so I'm not even really sure that they were the right item. They were hot, at least.

The fries were hot and crispy and the staff were friendly, which is why I even gave 2 stars.

name: J. W.
text:
We've been going to McDonald's for almost 40 years and this was the worst one we've ever been to. The service was horrible. There was only one person taking orders. The line from the counter went all the way to the door. After I finally placed our order, I realized that people weren't receiving the food they ordered. People, both inside the store and in the drive-thru lines were coming back to the counter to get things that they ordered but didn't receive. Some people took their orders, got in the car and left and then had to come back because they didn't get their complete order. We waited more than a half an hour "after" I placed our order. At that point, I realized that they'd "skipped" our number and questioned the girl at the counter who told me it would be up "soon."  I had only ordered two things a Southwest salad and a plain hamburger. I waited a few more minutes, while several more orders were filled, including one order that they filled twice, but my order still wasn't filled. At that point, I stopped the girl again and asked her for a refund. Just as I asked for my refund, another woman came in from the drive thru and said she'd been waiting outside forever for the rest of her order and she wanted a refund too. The girl looked at me, handed me a hamburger (she didn't even bother to put it in a bag) and said she'd refund my salad. I gave the cold hamburger back and told her I wanted a refund for "all" of my order. It took her a minute or two to read the receipt. She couldn't seem to tell the difference between the cash I'd given her and the amount of the bill, but I did eventually get my money back.

My husband's diabetic and controls his blood sugar level with food. We'd stopped there because it was time for him to eat and he truly needed that salad. I've never been to such a "sorry" McDonald's. No one who worked there seemed to care whether the orders were correct or not. They definitely didn't care how long it took to fill an order or how long you had to wait to place an order. We left that store, drove about a mile to Arby's and had our food within 5 min of walking in the door.

name: Daniel Dechenne
text: Possibly one of the slowest McDonald's I've ever visited. They have to drive through lanes that feed into one, and I'm not sure they can manage one lane, let alone two. The food is always decent but you would really have to be craving McDonald's to want to sit in the line.

name: Cloressa Cox
text: We visited here yesterday and on our order we had a double quarter pounder plus several other meals. We got all the way home and went to eat and the patties were still raw! I did contact the manager and they are going to replace the order but we had done went all the way home so that was one family member that had to fix something different to eat to keep us from having to drive all the way back down there. This definitely should not happen!

name: Bill Koehler
text: As a former McDonald's veteran, it's disappointing to see a franchise with much potential operate at a lower capacity. The drive thru was backed up (on a SUN evening) and the team wasn't using the 2nd drive-thru pick up window. Customers don't know how to pull up past the ordering speakers and additionally block cars behind them from ordering,  which makes wait times longer. The Happy Meal order for my son bears the receipt stating 'No Onions' and yet his cheeseburger still had onions on it.  They can do better.

name: Barry Swartzwelder
text: The guy in front of us, got tired of waiting and left.  I was able to play a couple of rounds of solitaire (on my phone) after paying, and while waiting for the food.  Fries were cold AZ nd unsalted, we also did not get napkins.  I asked for napkins and asked to trade fries.  I believe they gave the same back.  They were also cold.  I too, was tired of waiting.  I took the cold fries and left.

name: Mary Baldwin
text: Great service! This is the best McDonald's in Huntsville.. Quality food , quick service, friendly staff and never have a problem with something missing or wrong with my order!

name: Holley Jett
text: The cashier is always extra nice and it is just really good to see a smiling face, and someone who's happy to help you.... with all that's going on in the world these days.

name: Cameron McCarty
text: I mean what can I say. It's McDonald's. Never been inside, but what I can see looks quite clean. Food is fresh and my order has never been wrong. Drive through can pile up sometimes which can be an issue during peak times, but overall a good place

name: Eric Eubank
text: Supposed to be fast food but I don't consider waiting 15 minutes to be fast at all. There wasn't a lunch rush so I'm not sure what the issue happened to be during the time I visited. When I got my food only the fries were hot. The burger was kinda warm bordering on cold.

name: Bethany Jones
text: Me and my husband stop here every morning for breakfast, the service is terrible. The drive through worker never lets us finish our order always cuts us off and we have to finish our order at the window. Almost every time there is never a line but yet the service is so slow. Your morning workers are completely rude and unpleasant. Y’all definitely do not deserve 15$ an hour. Will no longer be stopping by there again.

name: Kent Hutchinson
text: Fastest breakfast drive thru in the business.  Sausage , egg,  and cheese on bread never tasted so fresh!

name: Andrew Walters
text: Often long lines. Hit or miss order accuracy. Sub par food quality as per most McDonald's locations. Don't eat fast food if you can help it.

name: Jason Young
text: Typical McDonalds experience.  Mobile order came out in a reasonable amount of time and was still hot.

When asked if she realized that not covering her nose made the mask useless she responded "right" and pulled her mask down even more. I will not be getting food from this place in the future.

name: BelleAmé Brielle
text:
I worked at this location a year ago for about 7 months, I miss each and every 1 of my co workers and managers
As well, as the people that work at the corporate office, the owners are really great people as well, very loving and understanding people
The McDonald’s is always clean, and hires the best kinds of people, they are really particular about hiring people who aren’t friendly and people that don’t want to work, they stayed on us about providing hot food!!!!!

I miss my customers and I think about them all the time
This isn’t a real busy location but it can get that way especially during breakfast!
You won’t ever be disappointed at this location ❤️

name: Eric Campbell
text: Very fresh food. Very friendly staff.

name: Justin Rogenski
text: Wow this place used to be good until the past few times I’ve been there, so tonight is just a example of the poor management an poor communication, so I ordered 20pc chicken nuggets, two cheese burger with just cheese an meat, an large fries, I received one burger that had pickles an onions and sauce, but wait it gets worse, I also received a bun with cheese on it no meat just a bun with cheese, so we went in to correct the order the manager not only rolled her eyes at me but also seemed like she didn’t care that her employees messed up a order that’s so simple, the poor lady doing the drive through orders was trying but she couldn’t understand half of the order we said when we ordered. This place has gone down hill drastically and I do not recommend going to this place unless you want to eat a bun with cheese.

name: Michael Lovett
text: Love the New Kiosk and Ease of Ordering, but this restaurant is filthy considering it was renovated I believe in the last couple of years.  The Restrooms have crud on the walls, near the sinks, the lobby area floors and tables are always dirty and grime is evident.  The kitchen area always has a collection of food on the floor as it is apparent the Management doesn't put cleaning as a priority.  If I were the owner of this establishment I'd have a conversation with the Management Staff and workers.  Explaining that a staff member should always be cleaning the Lobby and Restroom areas, and removing built up Grime that is on the Bathroom walls, Floors, and throughout the establishment.  The Play Area for the Children doesn't look like the surfaces have been cleaned with Lysol or anything since it was built.  It is really sad, as the food quality and presentation from the staff is generally very good, the staff are generally very friendly, but the management isn't doing it job on making sure the Lobby and Restrooms are kept clean.  Also of note when I did observe someone mopping the lobby, the water they were using was STINKING horribly due to dirt saturation.  Staff needs to be trained on proper cleaning etiquette.  Management should consider having a Night Crew to come in and do a thorough cleaning at least once a week of the premises.

The McDs in Hampton Cove gets lots of business, it should be better.
RECOMMENDATION: Stop transitioning morning teams so much, some teams are better than others...use the best "listeners" on drive thru, your quickest, best performers on drive thru...

The  burger was wrap in paper ; the burger was hot, cheese was melted. The catsup, mustered, onions were just right.
The sweet tea is the best in the south, i requested light ice and thats how it came.
All together the food was good, fries were hot and the tea was delicious.
I would recommend this location as one of the best for great food, good price and made to order.
Few places get your order correct. This location does a great job at getting it write the first time. They deserve a 5 star rating. McDonalds, Owens Crossroad, AL.

text: Horrible.  My son and I walked inside because the drive thru line was 5+ cars deep before you ever hit the speaker box. I ordered a plain McDouble kids meal.  The teller kid rang it in wrong.  I noticed the error on their prompter screen and told him.  He walked over to where they were bagging up food and then never told anyone.  There were only 2 people in the entire store moving with any sense of urgency, one employee and the manager.  It was like they completely forgot about or just decided to put off the lobby people in favor of the drive thru.  Very irritated right now.

name: Josh Crutcher
text: I rarely eat at McDonald's but I do if I need a quick meal for cheap, I came here on my lunch break and the first thing I noticed was the dining area was a wreck. Trash on the floor, tables not clean and the trash over flowing. I proceeded to the line to place my order. There was a guy in front of me and I stood there for a while without a greeting our acknowledgement of our presences, no telling how long he stood in line. The managers pass us by they more concerned with the drive thru time then serving the guest in the lobby but neither line was moving. I look in the kitchen and the crew is handling meat with their hands (had on gloves) from the tray to the bun as well as trying to make a breakfast sandwich with the same hand the beef was on. I don't know if that is cross contamination or not but  I wouldn't want burger grease on my breakfast sandwich. After close consideration I left and went to lawlers. I was served in seconds with a longer line.

name: Jason Azbell
text:
The sandwiches and tenders were good.  The cashier was nice.  The new promo sweet potato waffle fries tasted good but were cold. Offer for Sundays... kids receive free kids meal with adult combo.  We ordered two adult combos and one child's meal.  After we sat down, I noticed that they didn't honor their own special and charged me for the kids meal.

The kids meal included bottled water as a choice. I had to ask for the bottled water because they were preparing us tap water.  The kids meal side choice of applesauce was rung up correctly, but they gave us curly fries.  We ordered a Dr. Pepper for one adult drink, and it was rung up correctly.  They gave us water instead.  They did refund me $3 cash for the $2.99 kids meal.  I guess I donated the 27 or 30 cents tax.  Not sure.

name: Michele Upton
text: I'm not sure what the problem currently is with the roast beef but the last few times I've ordered the beef and cheddar it's been a thick, miscut mess! Once it was just a roast beef (no cheddar) but still a horrible cut of meat that I had to throw away. The texture was rough and unpalatable. My order tonight was also thick and nowhere near the pleasant thin roast beef that I expect to get from Arby's. I'm at the point of not going to Arby's again because I'm tired of wasting my money on a less than eatable product. My husband has already washed his hands of them because of wrong orders at the drive thru. Who wants to drive all the way back to the restaurant to complain when you're already at home and tired? I don't and of course restaurants know this! Doubt seriously if I'll be back any time soon! Or maybe ever!

name: David Cagle
text:
As always, the food and service as well as the workers were great.  The workers were attentive and friendly as well as knowledgeable.  I've heard a lot of bad things about this Arby's, but even though there are times that that workers are possibly not "wonderful", I dare say that people who write bad reviews likely have more "bad" days than most others. That's why they have nothing positive to say about people who are new to the job,  having problems of their own or don't like the job they're having to do because they can't get the job they want or are qualified for.
Then you have those who just totally enjoy berating others and the business they go to.  They're angry because all they could get was a roast beef sandwich when they wanted a ribeye steak or maybe a T Bone.  I'm sorry you're stuck in a place where you aren't happy with your lowly position and can't afford to go to Ruth's Chris Steakhouse or even get a sirloin or T Bone from Waffle House.  Get over it.  Work hard wherever you are and do the best job anyone has ever done and that will help you get a chance for a position you can work up to. And stop complaining about others. Try being positive for a change and see what a difference it makes in your life and your career.
I will definitely be going back to ARBY'S to eat.  And,  by the way, no  I don't have any affiliation with the company or any of the employees.

text: I work at McDonald's I also enjoy going to eat there this time away that I like my peace and quiet and friendly friendly employees

name: Rosalyn Dudley
text:
Con: Drive thru was not working so I had to park and go inside. The manager was rude.
Pro: The food was fresh and hot.

name: Anthony Morace
text: They claim to cook your beef fresh as you order. It's the "Quarter Pounder with cheese".....it is still cold and dry and not as the "Mcdonald's Corporation claims. Their advertising and marketing is false and offensive. They want you to buy a $5 sandwich regardless. Just a rip off. When you call the local office of the franchise owners, they don't care. It's sad and bad business.

name: James Carden
text: The employees need to be trained on how to work with their customers.

name: D Lynn Taylor
text: Had to pull over and wait in a space about 5 more minutes for coffee? And I've got ice cream grocery store in the car. I got to pull over in the hot sun and wait. Okay, not real happy. They did have a sign up we're hiring. Maybe my next experience will be better.

name: Barbara White
text: To start off with I had to wait a long time for someone to come take my order. They went to the back and was back there goofing off finally someone yelled and told them they had a customer. It still took some time for them to come. They lost customers to Subway because people at a truck stop doesn't have time to wait like that. Time is money for a truck driver. Plus when I got my food surprisingly it was correct but my fish filet was over cooked. I like my food well done but my fish fillet was extra well. I only like my steak extra well and my fish well.

name: Anthony Morace
text: They claim to cook your beef fresh as you order. It's the "Quarter Pounder with cheese".....it is still cold and dry and not as the "Mcdonald's Corporation claims. Their advertising and marketing is false and offensive. They want you to buy a $5 sandwich regardless. Just a rip off. When you call the local office of the franchise owners, they don't care. It's sad and bad business.

name: Karen Vaughn
text:
I Went through the drive tonight and ordered
The new crispy chicken sandwhich...The chicken wasnt big at all...it looked liked a piece of chicken from their breakfast menu..
It didn’t even cover the bun...Very disappointed..
And ordered a fish sandwhich the night before and it had been sitting for awhile!!!Need to be more consistent with serving fresh food and the right food!!!

name: James Carden
text: The employees need to be trained on how to work with their customers.

name: Misty Melton
text: Went by this McDonalds on 2-21-2021 around 7:30pm they didn’t have it together at all at the 2nd window where you pick up your food and beverages. brought back the Ice Coffee tasted horrible! Told them please replace it with 2 sweet tea’s , get down the road the tea was unsweet! Tried calling no one EVER picks up the phone at this place . This is NOT my first HORRIBLE experience at this McDonalds, the last time I ate here was over a year ago, ordered one hashbrown and a chicken biscuit and had to get my order remade because someone wasn't wearing a hair net. name: Butch Hallmark
text:
This was a terrible experience. It sounded as though the person taking my order was annoyed from the jump. Understanding that it could be a bad day, stress, or maybe that's them being pleasant, I proceeded to the window. I was unable to pull all the way to the window because the cars needed to pull up. The person stuck her hand out with the receipt, reaching as far as she could, wasn't even looking in my direction, and said nothing. I, too, had to reach far outside of my vehicle to grab it. She immediately closed the window and got on her phone.

Upon making it to the food retrieval part, the lady asked me what I ordered. I told her (chicken mcnugget meal). She said (annoyed) "what else, sir?" I said it was just the meal. She said "and your drink?" I said a coke. She rolled her eyes, handed me the items, and closed the window.

I think maybe I need to manage my expectations moving forward... McDonald's staff should not be expected to say hello, thank you, or have a nice day. I will remember that from now on when choosing a restaurant to further clog my arteries. :)

Tl;dr: don't go here, they're not nice.

name: Frankie Patrick
text: Placed order at 5:32pm, time on receipt, when I got to the pickup window there were two cars pulled up waiting for their orders. I was told the fries were cooking and to pull over to the #2 slot to the side and my order would be out shortly. The two cars waiting received their orders and pulled away, other cars came and went yet I had not. Then a young man (the same that had told me to pull over) approached my car and asked for my receipt. I gave it to him.  After waiting for quite a while longer I still had not received my order. The drinks and two sundaes I had received at the pick up window were now a melted mess as it was in the 90s this day. Finally I was tired of waiting so I cut off my car which I had kept running this whole time with my A/C because of the heat, to go inside. As I approached the building an employee stepped out to as me what my order was, I told her another employee had already been out to get my receipt. I went inside to the counter everyone was apologizing while they looked for my receipt. I told one of the employees that my two sundaes were a melted mess by now and she said they would replace them but I had to bring them in first. So I  go back outside to get them. When I got back to the counter there were two fresh sundaes waiting. They thanked me and acted as if that was all. I asked about the rest of my order,  again they had to search for the receipt. I had to wait several more minutes, while my second sundaes sat on the counter melting. Finally after many apologies I received my order and was again dismissed. I was sure to check my bag to make sure I had indeed gotten the correct items.  I had to ask for my receipt back as it was not in the bag. I went straight back to my car and recorded the time. It was 6:09pm ! Food was fresh and hot, fried were undercooked and soggy and my sundaes were melted. Bad experience.

text: Tonight I ordered a large mocha, there was no one at the first window so we went to the second one. The lady with red hair handed the drink and said here and slammed the window shut. We hadn't paid so I knocked on the window, I get ignored. I wait for a few minutes and she comes back shaking her head. She opened the window and I said we haven't paid yet and she said "she said you didn't have enough money." We informed her there wasn't anyone at the first window so we pulled up and she said "how much was it? " I said it's a large mocha however much that cost she said "just nevermind she already cancelled it." If I have to remind you to get money from me and you expect me to tell you how much it is I should be on the pay roll not you. I don't know why she would give us a drink if we couldn't pay for it anyways... She definitely wasn't doing it to be nice. Also I wondered what she said we said we didn't have money for it because we only talked to the girl who took the order. Another time I came here before and ordered coffee at 5pm and paid them they told us at the second window that the coffee machine was being cleaned and do we want to wait ten minutes. I said no I just want a refund and they made me fill out a receipt that asked for my number and address and signature and by the time they finished the refund it had been over ten minutes. They were also rude the whole time like it was my fault they decided to clean the machine at 5 and charge me before telling me how long it would take. Another time I ordered a meal with the Sprite through the drive through and they said I had to come in and get it in the lobby. 3 out of 3 experiences here have been bad. Every employee that I have talked to is rude. This is not just the only worst McDonald's, it's the worst attempt at a fast food restaurant since the dawn of time. I won't make the mistake of coming here again and I hope my review will spare you having to experience this cesspool.

name: Drew Petzold
text:
This McDonald's is located along Interstate 20/Interstate 59 at Exit 100 in McCalla, AL.  The place is pretty easy to get to and is just off the interstate exit.  It's located inside the Love's Travel Stop.  Our visit here was on August 4, 2018.

The place was pretty busy when we came in, which was not a surprise since it was around the lunchtime hour.  My niece was with us, and she wanted McDonald's, so that's the reason for the lunch stop here.  When you first come inside, the place was pretty nice.  There were some tables in there.  With the rush, there were workers there clearing tables as quickly as possible to keep them available for others to use.  I was still a bit apprehensive after seeing other reviews from here, but alas we were here anyways.

The wait in line to order was quick though.  Our wait on this visit was about 2 minutes, which wasn't bad considering how busy they were.  I ended up ordering a Quarter Pounder With Cheese meal, with a special order on the burger with no pickles and extra onions.  After a few minutes, the order was ready for all of us.  Almost all of the orders were correct.  The only error was with my burger.  They did no pickles and no onions instead of extra onions.  I went back up and asked for extra onions due to the mistake and they got that for me very quickly.  After that, it was time to eat.  The burger, fries, and drink were actually quite good and hot, which I don't normally expect at a fast food place.  The others in the group said their order was correct and the food was good and hot as well.

Overall, this was an okay McDonald's.  There does need to be some work at quality control to make sure orders come out correctly, but other than that, this visit fit the bill with no major issues.  If I am looking for a McDonald's and am in this area again, I'd still come back given the experience in this visit.

name: John Bryan
text:
This McDonald's will be run by Robots in the near future and the service will be 1000 times better.
The only reason it gave it a one star was because there are no negative stars to rate it.
The staff was beyond incompetent, I waited and watched as they not only screwed my order up but the order of 5 other people. The fact that the guy making hamburgers spoke NO English what so ever might have had something to do with it.
Between everyone waiting for their orders and people bringing back their WRONG orders the place was busy. I guess it would be when you have to wait 20 mins on a hamburger. This place was a Joke and I will not go back.

text: Not open 24 hours. After drivers work their asses off all day to get freight moves around this country the least we would like would be something to eat. But since this location advertises they are 24/7 They should uphold to it. It's complete bull that you walk into the store to get a hot meal of some sort and they look you dead in the face and sat we are closed until 230 am. Well guess what. We never close our doors because if we did you'd have no paycheck, people wouldn't have food yet down to the chair you use to sir in. How about maybe upholding your guys end and serve us guys that work through the night with a hot meal. Place is a joke. Period. The last damn thing you expect from a 24 hour truck stop that advertises 24 hour food.

name: James Burton
text: There's no outlets here for using your laptop or charging your phone. Also, tried to order a breakfast sandwich during the breakfast period, and the app said that the menu item wasn't available at this time of day. Breakfast not available during breakfast?? Whaaat??? When I went inside to ask about it, there was nobody already at the counter to help.

name: Doodles Bean
text:
On the good side thier ice cream machine worked, and the girl at the seccond window was adorable and very nice.

Unfortunately the kitchen staff took 20 minutes to put together a sandwich, and somehow managed to put the ketchup and mustard on the outside.

name: Stacie Byrd
text: This establishment lacks proper management and staff. I visit off and on hoping to see improvement, but it hasn't.  I won't be going back.  Service and the food is still disgusting or not made correctly. The managers and staff don't really care about the quality of their work nor the customer. To be honest, I've seen them come from the bathroom, and NOT WASH THEIR HANDS. Beware.....

name: Stevon Candler McDowell
text: Extended wait time with a not so friendly staff.. not a fan of McDonald’s anyway, however this one earned this review.

name: Jason Campbell
text:
This is by far the worst McDonald's we've ever been to. Drove up to the window
Speaker- Can I help you
Me- Yes I would like
Speaker- (interupted) oh I'm sorry I forgot we aren't taking orders right now.
Me- Really?
Speaker- yeah we are cleaning for about 20 minutes
Me- ok???
Drove past the window to see 2 girls on their phone laughing Not Cleaning. Every time we go here we are just amazed at how bad the service is.

name: Abyss Hibiscus
text: Service was nice... but they still messed up our order a SECOND time and all of it tasted old. There was something sticky all over my condiments 😟 and our cokes tasted bad 😢🥺💔

name: Nicole Davis
text: Went to get a crispy buttermilk biscuit with cheese and tomato and got a patty that looked burnt that was just thrown on the biscuit half off the biscuit. It was nasty and I couldn’t eat it. Not the 1st disappointment from here. They don’t care about quality. I will not be going there again.

name: Gloria Hotchkiss
text:
My coke had been sitting long enough for most of the ice to melt. I could have delt with that but whoever fixed our order was to lazy to make sure the lids were on tight. Having coke all over the car was not what I was expecting. I don’t know why I think going to McDonalds is a good idea. They are are always a disappointment from the service to the food

name: T Freeman
text: Worst customer service ever. I have went to this particular McDonald's several times and it seems that it's something every time. They have terrible customer service. I was told to pull into a waiting area so they could make fresh hash browns for my order. After exactly 10mins of waiting and watching vehicle after vehicle after vehicle get their orders and leave, I finally went I to the store with a manager. She refunded my money for the hash browns, witch was a very generous gesture. I watched my freshly cooked get pulled out of the grease, not be drained and put in the bag with the rest of my order, witch had been sitting there the entire time. The bag was torn, grease was literally dripping from it and my hash browns basically fell apart. On top of all of that, some of my order was left out. I pulled back around to the window and told the cashier that I had food left out and the hash browns were all broken apart and requested that my order be remade. U was asked if I just wanted a refund instead. When I said "No", the manager was called and instead of speaking to me like a valued customer, they basically interrogated me. I was asked, "Did you not see your food being bagged?" "Did you not see the hash browns come up fresh?" I gave the food back, witch SHOULD NOT be allowed with everything going on in the world, and asked that it be remade. I was again told to pull into a waiting spot. The customer service at this particular McDonald's is the worst I've ever encountered. The associates are rude and unprofessional. This is a reflection of leadership and management.

text: I gave McDonald's a three only because they have the best fries out of all other fast food chains but if I'm being honest ,there food taste artificial almost like there is a team of employees on a conveyor belt putting your food together as you order it .

name: Morgan Adams
text: The worst McDonald's you can go to. I ordered a Mcflurry. And when I got it there was a bite took out of it! I brought it back showing the manager. He argued with me that I had took a bite and was just trying to get a free Mcflurry. And that was not the case. Another visit I walked in and stood at the counter to order and there were two employees standing right behind the counter just talking. I stood there a good 5 minutes, I finally just walked out. Do not eat here

name: Shannon Wilson
text: Slow as hell or they get order wrong. Bacon and sausage are not the same thing!

name: Zack Shell
text: Shayla helped me out! She was super helpful and even though I left my wallet at home she covered my meal. That meant a lot! I didn’t have to travel all the way home. Thank you 👍🏻 Will return

name: Lovelysparxx 888
text: Slowest service and ur stuff will be wrong,  and bad attitude, the lady in the breakfast drive thru is the best thing about the place

name: Janice Patterson
text: It was ok

name: Melissia Lowery
text: So we went through the drive thru and ordered 14 cheese burgers. Simple order right? Nope. We were told we would have to come in for that. They were unable to put 14 cheeseburgers in a bag and hand them out the window.

name: Annie Booth Lemons
text: I love the iced tea with fresh lemon!

name: Meghan Alexander
text: Pulled me up for iced coffee waited 20 minutes finally went in they had forgot and were rude about it didn’t even make the right one

name: Michael Simpson
text: Every single time that I go to a fast food chain I have to repeat my order 3 times. I don't have a speech impairment. Please listen to your customers and maybe this will improve your drive thru time.

name: Sherry Dobbins
text: Priceville has playground...little kids love it.and kids love McDonald's food...

name: Julie Phillips
text: Fast food- they are not. Takes 20 min every time I’ve ever tried to go to the drive through. Employees are not friendly or accommodating. One time I ordered a Large Sweet tea and they gave me a medium. When I told her the mistake she poured the medium into a large cup and handed it to me. (No difference)

name: Shannon Wilson
text: Slow as hell or they get order wrong. Bacon and sausage are not the same thing!

name: Rachael Gardner
text: The lady that always works the cash register in the drive threw is wonderful but the foods quality and time are so much worse starting at 12:00

name: J Connor
text: The staff is absolutely deplorable here. There wasn’t a single employee doing what they should’ve been doing during my last visit; unless their job is to fight and argue and ignore lines of customers. When it was my turn to order, I was met with rudeness and impatience. The cashier was unwilling to answer questions, and ultimately got my order wrong. When I asked for it to be fixed, I was informed it would be at least 20 minutes before they could address my problems. I left the food and my money. Won’t be returning to this location anymore.

name: Ashley Robinson
text: Sometimes there food is good sometimes it's old

name: Melissia Lowery
text: So we went through the drive thru and ordered 14 cheese burgers. Simple order right? Nope. We were told we would have to come in for that. They were unable to put 14 cheeseburgers in a bag and hand them out the window.

name: Joel Lay
text:
The servers were rude.  Not just to me, they were rude to everyone.

The workers were arguing among each other.  Where was the manager?

I was 3rd in line when I walked up to the counter to place my order and it took over twenty minutes for me to get my order in.

My order number was 332.  I got a servers attention when she passed out order 339.  Once again the employees began arguing who made the mistake.

I took forty minutes for me to get my "eat in" order in a "to go" bag.

When I started to walk to a table, the server yelled at me that she had given me someone's order.  Needless to say, there went another five minutes of my life I will never get back.

While waiting on my order,  I saw five people walk out before placing an order.

If you have a craving for McDonald's in Decatur, I would recommend the McDonald's on Beltline Road.

name: Brittany Oden
text: If you want to eat at McDonald's, don't go to this one!!! I kept getting interrupted during my order. then I get up to the window and told that they don't have half the stuff I ordered. I would have gone somewhere else if I had known that. And they got rude because I asked about my stuff that I ordered. All they did was trying to switch it around on me without even telling me. I won't be back. Only reason it got one star was because I had to put something

name: Rachael Gardner
text: The lady that always works the cash register in the drive threw is wonderful but the foods quality and time are so much worse starting at 12:00

name: Shirley Davis
text: The food was fresh

name: Janet Howard
text: They are either out, machine not working or they just screw up the order 🤔

name: Tierra Shenea
text: This is one of the slower McDonald's restaurants and your good is usually wrong or cold. I ONLY come here when my 6 yr old begs for McDonald's. Two, if not all three,  of the locations in Decatur are owned by the same person and I must say that they are some of the worst McDonald's restaurants that you can visit...especially when it comes to customer service.

name: Carolyn Denton
text: They were very nice she cooked some fresh fries  was good give them A

text: Fast food- they are not. Takes 20 min every time I’ve ever tried to go to the drive through. Employees are not friendly or accommodating. text: Soy food, it doesn't mold. I have a child the loved to experiment with foods. Wouldn't give someone 8 sugars for their coffee. Last on my list to eat at. Allergic to soy

name: Michael Simpson
text: Every single time that I go to a fast food chain I have to repeat my order 3 times. I don't have a speech impairment. Please listen to your customers and maybe this will improve your drive thru time.

name: Linda Williford
text: VERY UNHAPPY.... ice cream machine not working, chicken nuggets  over done, French fries not good.  Worst bathroom of a McD that I have every been in.

name: Brian V
text:
You will wait for your food. The staff are NOT happy to serve you. The place is dingy, your order will never be accurate, and the number they provide for complaints will let you leave a message and, on rare occasion, will listen for about 10 seconds before hanging up on you.

Whoever manages this location knows that their address is in a good enough spot to maintain a high volume of customers. This is why it will never get better.

Start over. Throw out everything and start from scratch.

name: Didi Miller
text: There are worse but this one has become very consistent in parking you to wait on orders in drive thru and orders delivered wrong - today was no exception.

name: Marlena Watkins
text: Very slow service but friendly, no organization. Manager walking around with shirt tail out. How is this place still open? Does corporate ever visit? Nuggets were ice cold I didn't order fries but got some anyway. P&l must be outrageous! Worst Mcdonald's experience ever!

name: Daniel Lee Hogan
text: Juan the 3rd shift manager is doing an awesome job. First shift most people notice but it takes character to do it @ 2am when it's a ghost town. And I don't give 5 starts easy.

name: Amity Verduzco
text: I don’t have anything well to say about my experience. The lady taking our order was rude, and quite disrespectful. Then the restrooms were disgusting. There were only 2 toilets and both were clogged. A man came in after receiving his meal to go and told the lady that his burger had cheese when he clearly asked for no cheese. (Even said on the receipt ‘no cheese’) she told him “you didn’t tell me that” rolled her eye and stormed off to the back. Remade his burger with customers still in line. People waited and waited then left bc nobody was there to take their order.  Highly recommend going else where.

name: Deon Myers
text: Cuz they suck!!

name: Lily Quiales
text: Food is great. Your staff and manager that evening need to a refresher course on customer service. Need a warm greeting with eye contact, need to acknowledge customers once they approach the establishment,  need more staff, and definitely a parting comment.

name: Mikey Dudley
text: Food was cold

name: Marlena Watkins
text: Very slow service but friendly, no organization. Manager walking around with shirt tail out. How is this place still open? Does corporate ever visit? Nuggets were ice cold I didn't order fries but got some anyway. P&l must be outrageous! Worst Mcdonald's experience ever!

name: Tracy Livingston
text: This place is extremely slow. I waited 11min in drivethru for a bacon double cheeseburger n small fry. This happens every time I come here. The food is good but often cold like really? I'm just upset. I could be better.

name: Didi Miller
text: There are worse but this one has become very consistent in parking you to wait on orders in drive thru and orders delivered wrong - today was no exception.

name: Lany King
text: They are so disrespectful at this McDonald's. Its no manners here at all. Needs to be under better management with no kids working😠😠

name: kimbolinarino
text: 7:48 am. I ordered inside the restaurant. All I ordered was a small strawberry banana smoothie. I want you to know these employees at McDonalds make more than I do at my full time plant job. The cashier didn't even look me in the eye and wasn't about to give me my change, my smoothie tasted like straight ice and she just seemed like she couldn't care less. I work 3rds so I am awake, was being friendly smiling and patient. I will never stop here again. The people in front of and behind me got the same level of customer service. I took two sips of my smoothie, the second was just to make sure I wasn't crazy. I threw it in the trash on my way out. I get these often, I know what they are supposed to taste like. Awful customer service.

name: Kaila Freeman
text: I hate going to this McDonald's... Some of the workers are nice others just don't seem to know what's going on... It's more of a work hangout than a business... Today I ordered my family food got everything except my fries that I've been wanting.. The young man told me it be about 2 minutes which I was totally fine with I'm finally going to get fresh fries... Well while I was waiting the manager was yelling out orders the drive thru needed and said front counter wasn't waiting for any thing.... I thought to my self what you mean I'm waiting on the fries I paid for... So finally another young man asked what we were waiting on and told him fries so we finally got those and was ready to leave... Before we ever even went inside we waited at the drive-thru speaker box for 5 minutes at least to not have anyone try to take the order or acknowledge that we were there....

name: Graham Holland
text: Long lines, but charge reasonable prices.

name: Jerry Long
text: McD's, enough said...bacon 1/4 pounder is really good...

text:
Pitiful!  It's been that way for a while.
Slowest McDonald's, I've ever been to.
Staff seems to be untrained. Today they were out of napkins.  Many, many times,
the Frappe machine is broken, many times.
But, no napkins!  Stuff was running down my Frappe cup, and he said, no napkins.
Apparently management is non-existent!

name: Charles Anderson
text:
After making four trips from my house they finally got order right the manger was very rude and unacceptable WHAT A GOOD WAY TO REPERSENT MCDONALDS
Maybe get the older folks back in working and get the young one out that don't care what they put in ur bags in would. Be a lot better place

name: Charles White
text: Sad, I've been in Decatur for work over a nomon .Second time I've tried, haven't gotten any food yet. Today at 1103 they was not serving lunch. Ask why and was told it wasn't ready yet .Really you have no clue what I want to order. 1st time sit at 730 pm with 2 cars in front of me for 15 min. Never moved, looking at the reviews I'm sure it has been a sad store for sometime now and the franchise owner not carrying enough to fix the problem. It's been long enough, this store is ready for a corporate take over. Sad place to even think about going to.

text: Sorry to say, but believe all the bad reviews. This place really IS one of the worst food joints in town. My goodness the management is non existent. Soooooo slow, and food will come out luke warm, if lucky. I usually try to avoid being too harsh, but no way around it. It's that bad.

text: I've always experienced at least a 10 to 15 minute wait in the drive thru.

text: I lov their yogart parfaits. I eat those a lot. Great snack. Im not wild about their hamburgers and their fries r pretty good if u get them fresh.

name: Cicilia Ramirez
text:
ZERO STARS!!!!!This is the only McDonald's that I been to that has horrible customer service!!! They never have iced coffee or frappe. I went to get my food and a frappe this morning and they only gave me my food but the lady at the window forgot about my frappe and next thing you know I saw her leaving i guess she clocked out so I kept on waiting for my frappe and it took 30 mins in order for somebody to check the window and then gave me my frappe.
NEVER GO TO THE ON 6TH AVE!!!!!!!

Every time! Employees are rude, loud, and disrespectful. This place needs to be shut down ASAP! DEFINITELY CALLING CORPORATE!

text: My order was wrong. I ordered the chicken tenders and received chicken Mcnuggets. I asked for honey mustard dipping sauce and received sweet and sour sauce. I went thru the drive thru. Will avoid this McDonald's.

text: Foods hot and people are nice service a little slow but its better than the one across town

name: steve holt
text: Long waits cold food service sucks who ever owns this store needs to go. Each time I think it will get better I get disappointed. Nobody answer the phone numbers on the door or returns calls.

name: Andrew Conner
text: I loved the food but the kid beside me yelling "I want french fries" really annoyed me.

name: Chris Weaver
text: This morning after a long wait in the drive thru ,which I expect, I arrive at the drive thru speaker. No communication at all. 3 orders are taken at the other drive thru line and still no communication with me. I call out hello can you take my order please you are only taking from 1 side. After another order is taken from the other line I call out hello again. No communication at all still. I drove off. This was the 1st time in months I have been to this location. Everytime I come here there is an issue. We can only accept cash, we are out of breakfast wraps, we can not serve fountain drinks only tea or water, we can not serve ice cream or milkshakes. The ownership of this location should be embarassed and the corporation needs to step in and take over. Stay away from this location! Drive down the street to Sonic or Jack's!!

name: Teresa Costa
text: Went to the one on 6th Avenue and a customer was so rude and cursing the manager and employees. Uncalled for! I took my grandkids to the one on Danville Rd. We waited it least 20 minutes inside for our food to be made. The employees asked 3 times what it was that we ordered. Still no one was making our food. Then 2 women walked in dressed inappropriately and apparently 1 was an employee. Looks like they just let the employees off the clock come get free food. I spoke up since she went behind the counter and got her own nuggets. Then her friend cursed me and threatened me which was rude. Mothing was done about it. I demanded my refund and then she yelled and told the cook to forget the 5 McChicken Sandwiches. After all that time, our chicken wasn't even being made. Why does anyone ever eat here! I'll never return and neither will my friends and family! The Store Manager was on her Break outside. These people don't care and new people need to be hired. My grandkids were so upset after that woman threatened me! Ridiculous!!!

name: Cindy Mitchell
text: Courteous employees.  Dirty restaurant, filthy kitchen floor, malfunctioning equipment, uncaring appearance to the place. I will not go back.

name: Mereanoch Heart
text: I like mcds alot. That being said, this is the worst one ever. Avoid. Go to the one over on hwy 67 (the beltline) not this place. What a joke. Cold stale food, random hours, rude employees, out of everything all the time. Despite what it says on Google they are NOT open 24 hours. This place closes at random times and always after 11 or 12 or so at night. It's a shame because I live close by and have to drive across town to get McDs. They closed it down for a while and it reopened with new management but now it's worse than ever (2021)

So, if you are thinking about going to this particular branch, DON'T! Go to a different one. Calling the manager is useless as well! So I'm posting publicly to voice my thoughts.

Decatur, 6th Ave

name: Debra Williams
text: It never fails that 4 out of 5 times that I go through the drive thru that my order is wrong or the cheeseburger and fries are so cold I don't even give them to my dog. Once my Bacon Egg & Cheese Biscuit somehow magically turned into a sausage biscuit when I got home! And my hash browns I ordered with it mysteriously disappeared! The last wrong order I got a egg McMuffin instead of a cheeseburger. I didn't rewrap it. Just shoved back in the bag, turned car around and went back inside to complain. They were looking for the McMuffin and I told them it was in my bag. They took it out and wrapped in same wrapper that I had wadded up and sent it out to the car waiting!!! After about a 5 minute wait they gave me my cheeseburger and didn't give me a fresh order of fries. Didn't matter though because guess what?!? Both of them were cold as cardboard! McDonald's on 6th Avenue in Decatur either needs to hire competent employees and caring managers or they just need to shut the store down.

name: Angela D
text: Getting your money's worth went out the door at this subway.. My steak sandwich had not a heaping scoop like other subway sandwich shops and the order taker had the nerve to level out the meat on the scoop.  I believe what topped it all is the order taker made mention out loud that all they got was $2 each. Don't they get paid an hourly wage? And did she really deaerve a tip after she leveled my meat out instead of a heaping scoop. Big business really is gorging America because they can. Because there is no one to stand up against these franchises who want way more in money but do mot match the product. I am very disappointed in what I received today. I will not be going back anytime soon. I know my x comment wont matter. Subeay2will continue to find ways to cut back and get more of our monies. Thanks for a lousy lunch.

text: The food was good fast and service was friendly.. Ann Marie  is one of best waitress  I have encountered  in years. Her smile makes you feel welcome and her attitude is the best.. She makes you feel at home here and for a Trucker that means allot.. Keep up the good work...

text: If you are African American please do not stop by here. My husband and I was never properly greeted. Our food was half  cooked. Our waitress Amanda completely ignore us. The grits were thick, and disgusting. I also went online submitted the promo code for the survey  and complained. I submitted a complain on Google,  yellow pages app, and Facebook under the Huddle house and Lincoln, Alabama. Someone from huddle house will be calling soon and I will complain again. If you are black please RUN. I was hungry when I arrived and I was starving when I left.

name: Angela Downey
text:
The waitress was nice. The coffee was good.
Other than that it was a terrible experience.  All of the food was cold except the waffle but probably because we had them remade because they weren't dark enough.
I had to send back the eggs because they were over easy instead of over medium. The remake still wasnt cooked enough. The butter on the toast didn't melt because it was so cold. You'll be wasting your hard earned money eating here.

name: Lake Kraken
text: Hair in my food. Bugs on the window sill. Ordered onion rings and my brother got them with his order and I got tater tots. They didn't have fries. Also mixed our orders up. Never coming here again. Around 12 o clock.

text: Although some of the staff was friendly, they tried to make me pay for food I did not order.   I left and left the food. I've been in this store a few times and its always hit or miss.  Mostly miss. This was the last time I will visit. Instead, go to the 24 hour diner next door. A little more price wise and takes a little longer for them to cook your food, but the food is better and always nicer staff.

text: Great cooks and good food. You can tell that the staff here needs better leadership. Everything was great but it seems like a couple of waitresses didn't know the menu.

I'm not sure if we'll be back.

Every time I’m at this location though, I always enjoy the food and the customer service is always great. Antonio greeted us and took care of us and made us feel at home. I got the steak and cheese sub, chips, and a drink, and my wife got sliders. The bread was not fantastic on the sliders but overall it was a great experience for fast food. This location is super convenient to my office and our house. I’ll be back!
